7816605Di2015UniqueSeparator<body>Di2015NewLine<script>Di2015NewLine// taken from http://ariya.blogspot.com/2008/07/converting-between-hsl-and-hsv.htmlDi2015NewLinefunction hsv_to_hsl(s, v)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ss, ll;Di2015NewLine    ll = (2. - s) * v;Di2015NewLine    ss = 1. * s * v;Di2015NewLine    ss /= (ll <= 1.) ? (ll) : 2. - ll;Di2015NewLine    ll /= 2.;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return [ss, ll];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction do_colors(sat, light)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    n = 15;Di2015NewLine    document.write(n + " colors at " + sat + "% sat, " + light + "% lightness<br />");Di2015NewLine    for(var x = 0; x < n; ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hue = 360.0 / n * x;Di2015NewLine        html_chunk = "<div style='width: 50px; height: 50px; display: inline-block; background: hsl(" + hue + ", " + sat + "%, " + light + "%);'> </div>";Di2015NewLine        document.write(html_chunk);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    document.write("<br />");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedo_colors(100, 50);Di2015NewLinedo_colors(95, 75);Di2015NewLinedo_colors(75, 50);Di2015NewLinedo_colors(100, 35);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// rudimentary averages from your colorsDi2015NewLinesl = hsv_to_hsl(.7, .9);Di2015NewLines = sl[0] * 100;Di2015NewLinel = sl[1] * 100;Di2015NewLinedo_colors(s, l);Di2015NewLinedo_colors(75, 60);Di2015NewLine</script>Di2015NewLine</body>Di2015NewLine

7820200Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Slice<T>(this IEnumerable<T> list, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var slice = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        slice.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        if (slice.Count >= size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return slice;Di2015NewLine            slice = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (slice.Count > 0) yield return slice;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

               Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string GetCreateTableFromSqlCode(string sqlSelect,string tableName, SqlConnection con)Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(string.Format("SET FMTONLY ON;\\r\\n{0}\\r\\nSET FMTONLY OFF;",sqlSelect), con);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                con.Open();Di2015NewLine                SqlDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine                DataTable dt = reader.GetSchemaTable();Di2015NewLine                reader.Close();Di2015NewLine                return GetCreateTableScript(dt, tableName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (con.State == ConnectionState.Open)Di2015NewLine                    con.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string GetCreateTableScript(DataTable dt,string tableName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string snip = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sql = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            sql.AppendFormat("CREATE TABLE {0}\\r\\n(\\r\\n",tableName);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < dt.Rows.Count;i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataRow dr = dt.Rows[i];Di2015NewLine                snip = GetColumnSql(dr);Di2015NewLine                sql.AppendFormat((i < dt.Rows.Count - 1) ? snip : snip.TrimEnd(',','\\r','\\n'));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sql.AppendFormat("\\r\\n)");Di2015NewLine            return sql.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string GetColumnSql(DataRow dr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sql = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            sql.AppendFormat("\\t[{0}] {1}{2} {3} {4},\\r\\n",Di2015NewLine                dr["ColumnName"].ToString(),Di2015NewLine                dr["DataTypeName"].ToString(),Di2015NewLine                (HasSize(dr["DataTypeName"].ToString())) ? "IDENTITY" : "",Di2015NewLine                (dr["AllowDBNull"].ToString() == "true") ? "NULL" : "NOT NULL");Di2015NewLine            return sql.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool HasSize(string dataType)Di2015NewLine        { 7822356Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<TResult> Generate<TState, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    TState initialState,Di2015NewLine    Func<TState, bool> condition,Di2015NewLine    Func<TState, TState> iterate,Di2015NewLine    Func<TState, TResult> resultSelector,Di2015NewLine    IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new AnonymousObservable<TResult>((IObserver<TResult> observer) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TState state = initialState;Di2015NewLine        bool first = true;Di2015NewLine        return scheduler.Schedule((Action self) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool flag = false;Di2015NewLine            TResult local = default(TResult);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (first)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    first = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    state = iterate(state);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                flag = condition(state);Di2015NewLine                if (flag)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    local = resultSelector(state);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                observer.OnError(exception);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (flag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                observer.OnNext(local);Di2015NewLine                self();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                observer.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7822926Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string PostData(string url, byte[] postData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = null;Di2015NewLine        Uri uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLine        request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = postData.Length;Di2015NewLine        using (Stream writeStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writeStream.Write(postData, 0, postData.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string result = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        using (HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream responseStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (StreamReader readStream = new StreamReader(responseStream, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = readStream.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7823731Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int FindClosest(IList<int> points, int desiredNumber)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int nearest = -1;Di2015NewLine    int latestDistance = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (int t in points)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (t == desiredNumber)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int currentDistance = Math.Abs(desiredNumber - t);Di2015NewLine        if (currentDistance < latestDistance) Di2015NewLine        {                    Di2015NewLine            nearest = t;Di2015NewLine            latestDistance = currentDistance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return nearest;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7824782Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Entity : TableServiceEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Text { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Entity() { }Di2015NewLine    public Entity(string rowkey) : base(string.Empty, rowkey) { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Update(CloudStorageAccount account)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ctx = account.CreateCloudTableClient().GetDataServiceContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var entity = new Entity("foo") { Text = "bar" };Di2015NewLine        ctx.AttachTo("testtable", entity, "*");Di2015NewLine        ctx.UpdateObject(entity);Di2015NewLine        ctx.SaveChangesWithRetries();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var account = CloudStorageAccount.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLine        var tables = account.CreateCloudTableClient();Di2015NewLine        tables.CreateTableIfNotExist("testtable");Di2015NewLine        var ctx = tables.GetDataServiceContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try { Update(account); } catch (Exception e) { Console.WriteLine("Exception (as expected): " + e.Message); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ctx.AddObject("testtable", new Entity("foo") { Text = "foo" });Di2015NewLine        ctx.SaveChangesWithRetries();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try { Update(account); } catch (Exception e) { Console.WriteLine("Unexpected exception: " + e.Message); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Now text is: " + tables.GetDataServiceContext().CreateQuery<Entity>("testtable").Where(e => e.PartitionKey == string.Empty && e.RowKey == "foo").Single().Text);Di2015NewLine        tables.DeleteTableIfExist("testtable");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7826000Di2015UniqueSeparator    using System; Di2015NewLine    using System.Linq; Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic; Di2015NewLine    using System.Text; Di2015NewLine    using System.Threading; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    namespace QueueDoodles Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static readonly string[] data = { "a", "b", "c", "d", "e", "f", "g", "h" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var running = true;Di2015NewLine            var rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine            var q = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine            var qEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            var pollThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(delegate()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (running)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Queue the next valueDi2015NewLine                    var value = data[rand.Next(data.Length)];Di2015NewLine                    q.Enqueue(value);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0} queued {1}", Thread.CurrentThread.Name, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Signal waiting threadDi2015NewLine                    qEvent.Set();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Simulate pollingDi2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(rand.Next(100));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine            pollThread.Name = "Poll Thread";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var workerThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(delegate()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (running)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Wait on the queueDi2015NewLine                    if (!qEvent.WaitOne())Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    qEvent.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Process the next queue itemDi2015NewLine                    var value = q.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0} queued {1}", Thread.CurrentThread.Name, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine            workerThread.Name = "Worker Thread";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start the poll threadDi2015NewLine            pollThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Give it some time to fill queueDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start the worker threadDi2015NewLine            workerThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Wait for keyboard inputDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            running = false;Di2015NewLine            qEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7826073Di2015UniqueSeparatorClear()
7826093Di2015UniqueSeparatorint a = 34;Di2015NewLineint b = 25;Di2015NewLineint c = 15;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data = new byte[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Store to byte arrayDi2015NewLinedata[0] = (byte)((a << 2) + (b >> 4));Di2015NewLinedata[1] = (byte)((b << 4) + c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Read from byte arrayDi2015NewLinea = data[0] >> 2;Di2015NewLineb = ((data[0] & 3) << 4) + (data[1] >> 4);Di2015NewLinec = data[1] & 15;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("a = " + a); // 34Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("b = " + b); // 25Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("c = " + c); // 15Di2015NewLine

7826245Di2015UniqueSeparator// Open the file for readingDi2015NewLineusing (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader((Stream)file1.PostedFile.InputStream))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // as long as we have content to read, continue readingDi2015NewLine  while (reader.Peek() > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // split the line by the equal sign. so, e.g. if:Di2015NewLine    //   ReadLine() = .RES B7=121Di2015NewLine    // thenDi2015NewLine    //   parts[0] = ".RES b7";Di2015NewLine    //   parts[1] = "121";Di2015NewLine    String[] parts = reader.ReadLine().split(new[]{ '=' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make the values a bit more bullet-proof (in cases where the line mayDi2015NewLine    // have not split correctly, or we won't have any content, we defaultDi2015NewLine    // to a String.Empty)Di2015NewLine    // We also Substring the left hand value to "skip past" the ".RES" portion.Di2015NewLine    // Normally I would hard-code the 5 value, but I used ".RES ".Length toDi2015NewLine    // outline what we're actually cutting out.Di2015NewLine    String leftHand = parts.Length > 0 ? parts[0].Substring(".RES ".Length) : String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    String rightHand = parts.Length > 1 ? parts[1] : String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // output will now contain the line you're looking for. Use it as you wishDi2015NewLine    String output = String.Format("<label>{0}</label><input type=\\"text\\" value=\\"{1}\\" />", leftHand, rightHand);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Don't forget to close the stream when you're done.Di2015NewLine  reader.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7826392Di2015UniqueSeparatorbase.OnVisibleChanged
7826524Di2015UniqueSeparator    private List<Rectangle> _rects = new List<Rectangle>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GenerateRects()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int width = 300; // or whatever dimensions...Di2015NewLine        int height = 300;Di2015NewLine        int gridSize = 50;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < width; x += gridSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < height; y += gridSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var rect = new RectangleDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Opacity = 0,Di2015NewLine                    Width = Math.Min(gridSize, width - x),Di2015NewLine                    Height = Math.Min(gridSize, height - y),Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Canvas.SetLeft(rect, x);Di2015NewLine                Canvas.SetTop(rect, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _rects.Add(rect);Di2015NewLine                this.paint.Children.Add(rect);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7826524Di2015UniqueSeparator    class LineSegmentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public double X1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double X2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double Y1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double Y2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool SegmentsIntersect(LineSegment A, LineSegment B)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double x1 = A.X1, x2 = A.X2, x3 = B.X1, x4 = B.X2;Di2015NewLine        double y1 = A.Y1, y2 = A.Y2, y3 = B.Y1, y4 = B.Y2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double denominator = (y4 - y3) * (x2 - x1) - (x4 - x3) * (y2 - y1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (denominator == 0)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double ua = ((x4 - x3) * (y1 - y3) - (y4 - y3) * (x1 - x3)) / denominator;Di2015NewLine        double ub = ((x2 - x1) * (y1 - y3) - (y2 - y1) * (x1 - x3)) / denominator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (ua > 0 && ua < 1 && ub > 0 && ub < 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool RectIntersectsLine(Rect A, LineSegment B)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (SegmentsIntersect(B, new LineSegment { X1 = A.X, Y1 = A.Y, X2 = A.X, Y2 = A.Y + A.Height }) ||Di2015NewLine            SegmentsIntersect(B, new LineSegment { X1 = A.X, Y1 = A.Y + A.Height, X2 = A.X + A.Width, Y2 = A.Y + A.Height }) ||Di2015NewLine            SegmentsIntersect(B, new LineSegment { X1 = A.X + A.Width, Y1 = A.Y + A.Height, X2 = A.X + A.Width, Y2 = A.Y }) ||Di2015NewLine            SegmentsIntersect(B, new LineSegment { X1 = A.X + A.Width, Y1 = A.Y, X2 = A.X, Y2 = A.Y }) ||Di2015NewLine            RectContainsPoint(A, new Point(B.X1, B.Y1)) ||Di2015NewLine            RectContainsPoint(A, new Point(B.X2, B.Y2)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool RectContainsPoint(Rect A, Point B)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (B.X > A.X && B.X < A.X + A.Width && B.Y > A.Y && B.Y < A.Y + A.Height);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7826524Di2015UniqueSeparator    void FingerMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.IsDrawing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.DestinationPoint = e.GetPosition(paint);Di2015NewLine            LineSegment line = new LineSegmentDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                X1 = this.DestinationPoint.X,Di2015NewLine                Y1 = this.DestinationPoint.Y,Di2015NewLine                X2 = this.OriginPoint.X,Di2015NewLine                Y2 = this.OriginPoint.YDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var rect in _rects)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var x = Canvas.GetLeft(rect);Di2015NewLine                var y = Canvas.GetTop(rect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (RectIntersectsLine(new Rect(x, y, rect.Width, rect.Height) , line))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    rect.Opacity = 1;Di2015NewLine                    rect.Fill = Color;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.OriginPoint = this.DestinationPoint;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7834352Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string ConvertWord(string word, HashSet<string> discovered)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(word.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in word)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (discovered.Contains(c.ToString()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append('_');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHashSet<string> discovered = new HashSet<string>(StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The "secret" wordDi2015NewLinestring word = "Hello world";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// How to add letters to the ones discoveredDi2015NewLinediscovered.Add("l");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The word ready to be shownDi2015NewLinestring convertWord = ConvertWord(word, discovered);Di2015NewLine

7838225Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DocumentADi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string AgencyNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Description { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Establishment { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DocumentA() Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AgencyNumber = "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7838225Di2015UniqueSeparatorType.GetFields
7838258Di2015UniqueSeparator    class FixtureDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Home { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Away { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void CallCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string players = new string[] { "A", "B", "C", "D" };Di2015NewLine        List<Fixture> fixtures = CalculateFixtures(players);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Fixture> CalculateFixtures(string[] players)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //create a list of all possible fixtures (order not important)Di2015NewLine        List<Fixture> fixtures = new List<Fixture>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < players.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < players.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (players[i] != players[j])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fixtures.Add(new Fixture() { Home = players[i], Away = players[j] });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fixtures.Reverse();//reverse the fixture list as we are going to remove element from this and will therefore have to start at the endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //calculate the number of game weeks and the number of games per weekDi2015NewLine        int gameweeks = (players.Length - 1) * 2;Di2015NewLine        int gamesPerWeek = gameweeks / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Fixture> sortedFixtures = new List<Fixture>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //foreach game week get all available fixture for that week and add to sorted listDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < gameweeks; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sortedFixtures.AddRange(TakeUnique(fixtures, gamesPerWeek));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sortedFixtures;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Fixture> TakeUnique(List<Fixture> fixtures, int gamesPerWeek)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Fixture> result = new List<Fixture>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //pull enough fixture to cater for the number of game to playDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < gamesPerWeek; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //loop all fixture to find an unused set of teamsDi2015NewLine            for (int j = fixtures.Count - 1; j >= 0; j--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //check to see if any teams in current fixtue have already been used this game week and ignore if they haveDi2015NewLine                if (!result.Any(r => r.Home == fixtures[j].Home || r.Away == fixtures[j].Home || r.Home == fixtures[j].Away || r.Away == fixtures[j].Away))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //teams not yet usedDi2015NewLine                    result.Add(fixtures[j]);Di2015NewLine                    fixtures.RemoveAt(j);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7838993Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string RetrieveData(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // used to build entire inputDi2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // used on each read operationDi2015NewLine        var buf = new byte[8192];Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // prepare the web page we will be asking forDi2015NewLine            var request = (HttpWebRequest)Di2015NewLine                                     WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           /* Using the proxy class to access the siteDi2015NewLine            * Uri proxyURI = new Uri("http://proxy.com:80");Di2015NewLine            request.Proxy = new WebProxy(proxyURI);Di2015NewLine            request.Proxy.Credentials = new NetworkCredential("proxyuser", "proxypassword");*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // execute the requestDi2015NewLine            var response = (HttpWebResponse)Di2015NewLine                                       request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // we will read data via the response streamDi2015NewLine            Stream resStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string tempString = null;Di2015NewLine            int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // fill the buffer with dataDi2015NewLine                count = resStream.Read(buf, 0, buf.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // make sure we read some dataDi2015NewLine                if (count != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // translate from bytes to ASCII textDi2015NewLine                    tempString = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buf, 0, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // continue building the stringDi2015NewLine                    sb.Append(tempString);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (count > 0); // any more data to read?Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(@"Failed to retrieve data from the network. Please check you internet connection: " +Di2015NewLine                            exception);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7839018Di2015UniqueSeparator   static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var stringToSearch = "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbb";Di2015NewLine        Regex regExp = new Regex(stringToSearch, RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.CultureInvariant | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sourceText = "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAbb";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       const int Iterations = 100000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine       watch.Start();Di2015NewLine       for (int i = 0; i < Iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           regExp.IsMatch(sourceText);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine       Console.WriteLine("RegExp: {0} ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine       watch.Start();Di2015NewLine       for (int i = 0; i < Iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           sourceText.IndexOf(stringToSearch, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine       Console.WriteLine("RegExp: {0} ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine       Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7841436Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Collections.Concurrent.BlockingCollection
7841436Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyCollectionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class BlockingQueue<T> : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Queue<T> _Queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine        SemaphoreSlim _ItemsInQueue = null;Di2015NewLine        SemaphoreSlim _FreeSlots = null;Di2015NewLine        int _MaxItems = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public BlockingQueue(int maxItems=Int32.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _MaxItems = maxItems;Di2015NewLine            _ItemsInQueue = new SemaphoreSlim(0, maxItems);Di2015NewLine            _FreeSlots = new SemaphoreSlim(maxItems, maxItems);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_ItemsInQueue != null) _ItemsInQueue.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            if (_FreeSlots != null) _FreeSlots.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _ItemsInQueue.CurrentCount; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Add(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_MaxItems != Int32.MaxValue) _FreeSlots.Wait();Di2015NewLine            lock (this)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _Queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine                _ItemsInQueue.Release();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Take()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item = default(T);Di2015NewLine            _ItemsInQueue.Wait();Di2015NewLine            lock (this)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 item = _Queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                 if (_MaxItems != Int32.MaxValue)  _FreeSlots.Release();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7843223Di2015UniqueSeparator...Di2015NewLinemapper.IsPersistentProperty((memberInfo, declared) => IsPersistentProperty(mapper.ModelInspector, memberInfo, declared, "YourPropertyName"));Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool IsPersistentProperty(IModelInspector modelInspector, MemberInfo member, bool declared, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (declared ||(member is PropertyInfo) && !IsReadOnlyProperty(member)) && !member.Name.Equals(propertyName);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsReadOnlyProperty(MemberInfo subject)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const BindingFlags defaultBinding = BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var property = subject as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine    if (property == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (CanReadCantWriteInsideType(property) || CanReadCantWriteInBaseType(property))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !PropertyToField.DefaultStrategies.Values.Any(s => subject.DeclaringType.GetField(s.GetFieldName(property.Name), defaultBinding) != null) || IsAutoproperty(property);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool IsAutoproperty(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return property.ReflectedType.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.InstanceDi2015NewLine                                                                             | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly).Any(pi => pi.Name == string.Concat("<", property.Name, ">k__BackingField"));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool CanReadCantWriteInsideType(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return !property.CanWrite && property.CanRead && property.DeclaringType == property.ReflectedType;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool CanReadCantWriteInBaseType(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (property.DeclaringType == property.ReflectedType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var rfprop = property.DeclaringType.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.InstanceDi2015NewLine                                                                             | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly).SingleOrDefault(pi => pi.Name == property.Name);Di2015NewLine    return rfprop != null && !rfprop.CanWrite && rfprop.CanRead;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7852721Di2015UniqueSeparatorTemperatureConverter
7852721Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Generic conversion class for converting between values of different units.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TUnitType">The type representing the unit type (eg. enum)</typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="TValueType">The type of value for this unit (float, decimal, int, etc.)</typeparam>Di2015NewLineabstract class UnitConverter<TUnitType, TValueType>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The base unit, which all calculations will be expressed in terms of.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected static TUnitType BaseUnit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Dictionary of functions to convert from the base unit type into a specific type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    static ConcurrentDictionary<TUnitType, Func<TValueType, TValueType>> ConversionsTo = new ConcurrentDictionary<TUnitType, Func<TValueType, TValueType>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Dictionary of functions to convert from the specified type into the base unit type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    static ConcurrentDictionary<TUnitType, Func<TValueType, TValueType>> ConversionsFrom = new ConcurrentDictionary<TUnitType, Func<TValueType, TValueType>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Converts a value from one unit type to another.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value to convert.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="from">The unit type the provided value is in.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="to">The unit type to convert the value to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The converted value.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public TValueType Convert(TValueType value, TUnitType from, TUnitType to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If both From/To are the same, don't do any work.Di2015NewLine        if (from.Equals(to))Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert into the base unit, if required.Di2015NewLine        var valueInBaseUnit = from.Equals(BaseUnit)Di2015NewLine                                ? valueDi2015NewLine                                : ConversionsFrom[from](value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert from the base unit into the requested unit, if requiredDi2015NewLine        var valueInRequiredUnit = to.Equals(BaseUnit)Di2015NewLine                                ? valueInBaseUnitDi2015NewLine                                : ConversionsTo[to](valueInBaseUnit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return valueInRequiredUnit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Registers functions for converting to/from a unit.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="convertToUnit">The type of unit to convert to/from, from the base unit.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="conversionTo">A function to convert from the base unit.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="conversionFrom">A function to convert to the base unit.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected static void RegisterConversion(TUnitType convertToUnit, Func<TValueType, TValueType> conversionTo, Func<TValueType, TValueType> conversionFrom)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!ConversionsTo.TryAdd(convertToUnit, conversionTo))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Already exists", "convertToUnit");Di2015NewLine        if (!ConversionsFrom.TryAdd(convertToUnit, conversionFrom))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Already exists", "convertToUnit");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7852721Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum TemperatureDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Celcius,Di2015NewLine    Fahrenheit,Di2015NewLine    KelvinDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TemperatureConverter : UnitConverter<Temperature, float>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static TemperatureConverter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BaseUnit = Temperature.Celcius;Di2015NewLine        RegisterConversion(Temperature.Fahrenheit, v => v * 2f, v => v * 0.5f);Di2015NewLine        RegisterConversion(Temperature.Kelvin, v => v * 10f, v => v * 0.05f);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7852721Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar converter = new TemperatureConverter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Celcius, Temperature.Fahrenheit));Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Fahrenheit, Temperature.Celcius));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Celcius, Temperature.Kelvin));Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Kelvin, Temperature.Celcius));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Kelvin, Temperature.Fahrenheit));Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(converter.Convert(1, Temperature.Fahrenheit, Temperature.Kelvin));Di2015NewLine

7854860Di2015UniqueSeparator using iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLine using iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ExtractImagesFromPDF(string sourcePdf, string outputPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // NOTE:  This will only get the first image it finds per page.Di2015NewLine        PdfReader pdf = new PdfReader(sourcePdf);Di2015NewLine        RandomAccessFileOrArray raf = new iTextSharp.text.pdf.RandomAccessFileOrArray(sourcePdf);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int pageNumber = 1; pageNumber <= pdf.NumberOfPages; pageNumber++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PdfDictionary pg = pdf.GetPageN(pageNumber);Di2015NewLine                PdfDictionary res =Di2015NewLine                  (PdfDictionary)PdfReader.GetPdfObject(pg.Get(PdfName.RESOURCES));Di2015NewLine                PdfDictionary xobj =Di2015NewLine                  (PdfDictionary)PdfReader.GetPdfObject(res.Get(PdfName.XOBJECT));Di2015NewLine                if (xobj != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (PdfName name in xobj.Keys)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        PdfObject obj = xobj.Get(name);Di2015NewLine                        if (obj.IsIndirect())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            PdfDictionary tg = (PdfDictionary)PdfReader.GetPdfObject(obj);Di2015NewLine                            PdfName type =Di2015NewLine                              (PdfName)PdfReader.GetPdfObject(tg.Get(PdfName.SUBTYPE));Di2015NewLine                            if (PdfName.IMAGE.Equals(type))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                int XrefIndex = Convert.ToInt32(((PRIndirectReference)obj).Number.ToString(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine                                PdfObject pdfObj = pdf.GetPdfObject(XrefIndex);Di2015NewLine                                PdfStream pdfStrem = (PdfStream)pdfObj;Di2015NewLine                                byte[] bytes = PdfReader.GetStreamBytesRaw((PRStream)pdfStrem);Di2015NewLine                                if ((bytes != null))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    using (System.IO.MemoryStream memStream = new System.IO.MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        memStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                                        System.Drawing.Image img = System.Drawing.Image.FromStream(memStream);Di2015NewLine                                        // must save the file while stream is open.Di2015NewLine                                        if (!Directory.Exists(outputPath))Di2015NewLine                                            Directory.CreateDirectory(outputPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                        string path = Path.Combine(outputPath, String.Format(@"{0}.jpg", pageNumber));Di2015NewLine                                        System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters parms = new System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLine                                        parms.Param[0] = new                                      System.Drawing.Imaging.EncoderParameter(System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder.Compression, 0);Di2015NewLine      // GetImageEncoder is found below this methodDi2015NewLine                                        System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo jpegEncoder = GetImageEncoder("JPEG");Di2015NewLine GetImageEncoder(string imageType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        imageType = imageType.ToUpperInvariant();Di2015NewLine        foreach (ImageCodecInfo info in ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (info.FormatDescription == imageType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return info;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine

7855858Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Extends the LinqToTwitter LibraryDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class TwitterExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex _parseUrls = new Regex("\\\\b(([\\\\w-]+://?|www[.])[^\\\\s()<>]+(?:\\\\([\\\\w\\\\d]+\\\\)|([^\\\\p{P}\\\\s]|/)))", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex _parseMentions = new Regex("(^|\\\\W)@([A-Za-z0-9_]+)", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Regex _parseHashtags = new Regex("[#]+[A-Za-z0-9-_]+", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse Status Text to HTML equivalentDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="status">The LinqToTwitter <see cref="Status"/></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Formatted HTML string</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string TextAsHtml(this Status status)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string tweetText = status.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(tweetText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Replace URLsDi2015NewLine            foreach (var urlMatch in _parseUrls.Matches(tweetText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match match = (Match)urlMatch;Di2015NewLine                tweetText = tweetText.Replace(match.Value, String.Format("<a href=\\"{0}\\" target=\\"_blank\\">{0}</a>", match.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Replace MentionsDi2015NewLine            foreach (var mentionMatch in _parseMentions.Matches(tweetText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match match = (Match)mentionMatch;Di2015NewLine                if (match.Groups.Count == 3)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string value = match.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine                    string text = "@" + value;Di2015NewLine                    tweetText = tweetText.Replace(text, String.Format("<a href=\\"http://twitter.com/{0}\\" target=\\"_blank\\">{1}</a>", value, text));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Replace Hash TagsDi2015NewLine            foreach (var hashMatch in _parseHashtags.Matches(tweetText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match match = (Match)hashMatch;Di2015NewLine                string query = Uri.EscapeDataString(match.Value);Di2015NewLine                tweetText = tweetText.Replace(match.Value, String.Format("<a href=\\"http://search.twitter.com/search?q={0}\\" target=\\"_blank\\">{1}</a>", query, match.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tweetText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7860208Di2015UniqueSeparator// This server waits for a connection and then uses asynchronous operations toDi2015NewLine    // accept the connection with initial data sent from the client.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Establish the local endpoint for the socket.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IPHostEntry ipHostInfo = Dns.GetHostEntry(Dns.GetHostName());Di2015NewLine    IPAddress ipAddress = ipHostInfo.AddressList[0];Di2015NewLine    IPEndPoint localEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(ipAddress, 11000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a TCP/IP socket.Di2015NewLine    Socket listener = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Bind the socket to the local endpoint, and listen for incoming connections.Di2015NewLine    listener.Bind(localEndPoint);Di2015NewLine    listener.Listen(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Set the event to nonsignaled state.Di2015NewLine        allDone.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start an asynchronous socket to listen for connections and receive data from the client.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Waiting for a connection...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Accept the connection and receive the first 10 bytes of data.Di2015NewLine        int receivedDataSize = 10;Di2015NewLine        listener.BeginAccept(receivedDataSize, new AsyncCallback(AcceptReceiveCallback), listener);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Wait until a connection is made and processed before continuing.Di2015NewLine        allDone.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void AcceptReceiveCallback(IAsyncResult ar) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the socket that handles the client request.Di2015NewLine    Socket listener = (Socket) ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // End the operation and display the received data on the console.Di2015NewLine    byte[] Buffer;Di2015NewLine    int bytesTransferred;Di2015NewLine    Socket handler = listener.EndAccept(out Buffer, out bytesTransferred, ar);Di2015NewLine    string stringTransferred = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(Buffer, 0, bytesTransferred);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(stringTransferred);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Size of data transferred is {0}", bytesTransferred);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the state object for the asynchronous receive.Di2015NewLine    StateObject state = new StateObject();Di2015NewLine    state.workSocket = handler;Di2015NewLine    handler.BeginReceive( state.buffer, 0, StateObject.BufferSize, 0,Di2015NewLine    new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), state);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7860421Di2015UniqueSeparator// initComplete is set by each worker thread to tell StartThreads to continueDi2015NewLine//     with the next threadDi2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// allComplete is set by StartThreads to tell the workers that they have allDi2015NewLine//     initialized and that they may all resumeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid StartThreads()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var initComplete = new AutoResetEvent( false );Di2015NewLine    var allComplete = new ManualResetEvent( false );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var t1 = new Thread( () => ThreadProc( initComplete, allComplete ) );Di2015NewLine    t1.Start();Di2015NewLine    initComplete.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var t2 = new Thread( () => ThreadProc( initComplete, allComplete ) );Di2015NewLine    t2.Start();Di2015NewLine    initComplete.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var t6 = new Thread( () => ThreadProc( initComplete, allComplete ) );Di2015NewLine    t6.Start();Di2015NewLine    initComplete.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // allow all threads to continueDi2015NewLine    allComplete.Set();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ThreadProc( AutoResetEvent initComplete, WaitHandle allComplete )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // do initDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    initComplete.Set(); // signal init is complete on this threadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    allComplete.WaitOne(); // wait for signal that all threads are readyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // resume allDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7860561Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a vector that describes going from A to BDi2015NewLinevar AtoB = (B - A);Di2015NewLine// Make a vector going from A to B, but only one unit in lengthDi2015NewLinevar AtoBUnitLength = Vector2.Normalize(AtoB);Di2015NewLine// Make a vector in the direction of B from A, of length maxLengthDi2015NewLinevar AtoB1 = AtoBUnitLength * maxLength;Di2015NewLine// B1 is the starting point (A) + the direction vector of theDi2015NewLine// correct length we just created.Di2015NewLinevar B1 = A + AtoB1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// One liner:Di2015NewLinevar B1 = A + Vector2.Normalize(B - A) * maxLength;Di2015NewLine

7861602Di2015UniqueSeparatorp00,p01,...,p0n, p10,p11,...,p1n, p20,p21, ...Di2015NewLine
7861602Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] crop_area (byte[] source_image, int image_width, int image_height,Di2015NewLineint start_x, int start_y, int result_width, int result_height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] result = new byte[result_width * result_height];Di2015NewLine    int endX = x + result_width;Di2015NewLine    int endY = y + result_height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = startY; y < endY; y++)Di2015NewLine        for (int x = startX; x < endX; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /* To get to the pixel in the row I (starting from I=1), we needDi2015NewLine             * to skip I-1 rows. Since our y indexes start from row 0 (not 1),Di2015NewLine             * then we don't need to subtract 1.Di2015NewLine             *Di2015NewLine             * So, the offset of the pixel at (x,y) is:Di2015NewLine             *Di2015NewLine             *     y * image_width      +        xDi2015NewLine             * |-----------------------| |-----------------|Di2015NewLine             *   Skip pixels of y rows    Offset inside rowDi2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine            result[pos] = source_image[y * image_width + x];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Advance to the next pixel in the result image */Di2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Node {Di2015NewLine    Node Parent;Di2015NewLine    List<Node> Children = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    int NodeId;Di2015NewLine    string Data;Di2015NewLine    public Node(NodeRow row) { ... }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrent

7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrent.NodeId
7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrent = current.Parent
7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatornewRow
7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrent.Children
7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorcurrent

7864552Di2015UniqueSeparatorNode CreateTree(IEnumerable<NodeRow> rows) {Di2015NewLine    Node root = null;Di2015NewLine    Node current = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var row in rows) {Di2015NewLine        // Root:Di2015NewLine        if (root == null) { Di2015NewLine            root = current = new Node(row);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Traverse up the tree until the parent is found:Di2015NewLine        while (row.ParentNodeId != current.NodeId) {Di2015NewLine            current = current.Parent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Add the new node as a child of the current one:Di2015NewLine        var rowNode = new Node(row);Di2015NewLine        rowNode.Parent = current;Di2015NewLine        current.Children.Add(rowNode);Di2015NewLine        current = rowNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return root;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7864578Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GreaterThanAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public GreaterThanAttribute(string otherProperty)Di2015NewLine        :base("{0} must be greater than {1}")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OtherProperty = otherProperty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string OtherProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string FormatErrorMessage(string name)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        return string.Format(ErrorMessageString, name, OtherProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override ValidationResult Di2015NewLine        IsValid(object firstValue, ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var firstComparable = firstValue as IComparable;Di2015NewLine        var secondComparable = GetSecondComparable(validationContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (firstComparable != null && secondComparable != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (firstComparable.CompareTo(secondComparable) < 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new ValidationResult(Di2015NewLine                    FormatErrorMessage(validationContext.DisplayName));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }               Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ValidationResult.Success;Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected IComparable GetSecondComparable(Di2015NewLine        ValidationContext validationContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = validationContextDi2015NewLine                              .ObjectTypeDi2015NewLine                              .GetProperty(OtherProperty);Di2015NewLine        if (propertyInfo != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var secondValue = propertyInfo.GetValue(Di2015NewLine                validationContext.ObjectInstance, null);Di2015NewLine            return secondValue as IComparable;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7870825Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT Di2015NewLine    a1 / Rows As a1, Di2015NewLine    a2 / Rows As a2, Di2015NewLine    a3 / Rows As a3, Di2015NewLine    a4 / Rows As a4Di2015NewLineFROM Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    SELECT *, CAST(COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY NULL) as float) As RowsDi2015NewLine    FROM ExampleTableDi2015NewLine) DataDi2015NewLine
7870825Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @TableName varchar(100)Di2015NewLineDECLARE @Query varchar(max)Di2015NewLineSELECT @TableName = 'ExampleTable'Di2015NewLineSELECT @Query = 'SELECT 'Di2015NewLineSELECT @Query = @Query + '[' + COLUMN_NAME + '] / Rows as [' + COLUMN_NAME + '], 'Di2015NewLineFROM information_schema.COLUMNS col WHERE TABLE_NAME = @TableNameDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT @Query = @Query + 'Rows FROM ( SELECT *, CAST(COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY NULL) as float) As Rows FROM [' + @TableName + ']) Data'Di2015NewLineEXECUTE(@Query)Di2015NewLine

7872087Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String MatchExtra(string head, string extra)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!head.Contains(extra))Di2015NewLine        return head;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string criteria = extra + "\\\\([a-zA-Z0-9\\\\.\\\\+\\\\-\\\\*\\\\/]+\\\\)";Di2015NewLine    MatchCollection match1 = Regex.Matches(head, criteria, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match bracket_match in match1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bracket_match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {   // not finish if bracket have bracketDi2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < bracket_match.Captures.Count; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string a = bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString();Di2015NewLine                string b = bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Substring(extra.Length + 1, bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Length - extra.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine                result = MatchExtra(bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Substring(extra.Length + 1, bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Length - extra.Length - 2), extra);Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string criteria2 = extra + "\\\\(.*\\\\)";Di2015NewLine    MatchCollection match2 = Regex.Matches(head,  criteria, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match bracket_match in match2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bracket_match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {   // not finish if bracket have bracketDi2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < bracket_match.Captures.Count; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string a = bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString();Di2015NewLine                string b = bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Substring(extra.Length+1, bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Length - extra.Length -2);Di2015NewLine                result = MatchExtra(bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Substring(extra.Length+1, bracket_match.Captures[y].ToString().Length - extra.Length-2), extra);Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7873520Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Mapper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Copy all not null properties values of object source in object target if the properties are present.Di2015NewLine        /// Use this method to copy only simple type properties, not collections.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="source">source object</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="target">target object</param>Di2015NewLine        private static void SimpleCopy(object source, object target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo pi in source.GetType().GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object propValue = pi.GetGetMethod().Invoke(source, null);Di2015NewLine                if (propValue != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        PropertyInfo pit = GetTargetProperty(pi.Name, target);Di2015NewLine                        if (pit != null) pit.GetSetMethod().Invoke(target, new object[] { propValue });Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (Exception) { /* do nothing */ }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static PropertyInfo GetTargetProperty(string name, object target) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo pi in target.GetType().GetProperties()) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pi.Name.Equals(name, StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)) return pi;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7876022Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace testListDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write((int)'A');Di2015NewLine            Console.Write((int)'Z');Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Whats the starting string?");Di2015NewLine            string start = Console.ReadLine().ToUpper();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Whats the end string?");Di2015NewLine            string end = Console.ReadLine().ToUpper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<string> retVal = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            retVal.Add(start);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string currentString = start;Di2015NewLine            while (currentString != end)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                currentString = IncrementString(currentString);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(currentString);Di2015NewLine                retVal.Add(currentString);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            retVal.Add(end);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string IncrementString(string currentString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder retVal = new StringBuilder(currentString);Di2015NewLine            char endChar= currentString[currentString.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine            for (int x = (currentString.Length - 1); 7877736Di2015UniqueSeparatorint x = A() + B() + C() + 10;Di2015NewLine
7877736Di2015UniqueSeparatorload the address of x // The stack now contains address of xDi2015NewLinecall A()              // The stack contains address of x and result of A()Di2015NewLinecall B()              // Address of x, result of A(), result of B()Di2015NewLineadd                   // Address of x, result of A() + B()Di2015NewLinecall C()              // Address of x, result of A() + B(), result of C()Di2015NewLineadd                   // Address of x, result of A() + B() + C()Di2015NewLineload 10               // Address of x, result of A() + B() + C(), 10Di2015NewLineadd                   // Address of x, result of A() + B() + C() + 10Di2015NewLinestore in address      // The result is now stored in x, and the stack is empty.Di2015NewLine
7877736Di2015UniqueSeparatorAllocate temporary store T1 for result of A()Di2015NewLineCall A() with the address of T1Di2015NewLineAllocate temporary store T2 for result of B()Di2015NewLineCall B() with the address of T2Di2015NewLineAllocate temporary store T3 for the result of the first additionDi2015NewLineAdd contents of T1 to T2, then store the result into the address of T3Di2015NewLineAllocate temporary store T4 for the result of C()Di2015NewLineCall C() with the address of T4Di2015NewLineAllocate temporary store T5 for result of the second additionDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine

7879960Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic R DepthFirstGraphAccumulate<T, R>(Di2015NewLine    T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, R, R> accumulate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var accumulator = default(R);Di2015NewLine    var visited = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>;Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (!visited.Contains(current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            visited.Add(current);Di2015NewLine            foreach(var child in children(current))Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine            accumulator = accumulate(current, accumulator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return accumulator;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7879960Di2015UniqueSeparatorint total = DepthFirstGraphAccumulate<Node, int>(Di2015NewLine    startNode, Di2015NewLine    node=>node.NeighbouringNodes, Di2015NewLine    (node, sum)=>node.Value + sum);Di2015NewLine
7879960Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<T> DepthFirstGraphTraversal<T>(Di2015NewLine    T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var visited = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>;Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (!visited.Contains(current))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            visited.Add(current);Di2015NewLine            foreach(var child in children(current))Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine            yield return current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7879960Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach(var node in DepthFirstGraphTraversal<Node>(startNode, n=>n.NeighbouringNodes))Di2015NewLine     DoSomething(node);Di2015NewLine
7879960Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar nodes = from node in DepthFirstGraphTraversal<Node>(startNode, n=>n.NeighbouringNodes)Di2015NewLine            where condition(node)Di2015NewLine            select node;Di2015NewLineforeach(var matchingNode in nodes) DoSomething(matchingNode);Di2015NewLine

7880488Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string test1 = "bc3231dsc";Di2015NewLine        string tes2 = "bc3462dsc";Di2015NewLine        string firstmatch = GetMatch(test1, tes2, false);Di2015NewLine        string lasttmatch = GetMatch(test1, tes2, true);Di2015NewLine        string center1 = test1.Substring(firstmatch.Length, test1.Length -(firstmatch.Length + lasttmatch.Length)) ;Di2015NewLine        string center2 = test2.Substring(firstmatch.Length, test1.Length -(firstmatch.Length + lasttmatch.Length)) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetMatch(string fist, string second, bool isReverse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isReverse)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fist = ReverseString(fist);Di2015NewLine            second = ReverseString(second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        char[] ar1 = fist.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ar1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (fist.Length > i + 1 && ar1[i].Equals(second[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                builder.Append(ar1[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (isReverse)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ReverseString(builder.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ReverseString(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char[] arr = s.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        Array.Reverse(arr);Di2015NewLine        return new string(arr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7887300Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Clone<T>(T source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!typeof(T).IsSerializable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The type must be serializable.", "source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Don't serialize a null object, simply return the default for that objectDi2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(source, null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine    Stream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    using (stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        formatter.Serialize(stream, source);Di2015NewLine        stream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        return (T)formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7887786Di2015UniqueSeparator    private MySqlConnection NewConnection(string host, int port, string database, string user, string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (port <= 0) port = 3306;Di2015NewLine        string cstr = "";Di2015NewLine        if (database == "")Di2015NewLine            cstr = String.Format("SERVER={0};PORT={1};UID={2};PWD={3}",Di2015NewLine                host, port, user, password);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            cstr = String.Format("SERVER={0};PORT={1};DATABASE={2};UID={3};PWD={4}",Di2015NewLine                host, port, database, user, password);Di2015NewLine        MySqlConnection conn = new MySqlConnection(cstr);Di2015NewLine        try { conn.Open(); }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            conn = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return conn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ExecuteScript(MySqlConnection conn, string sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        err = "";Di2015NewLine        int totrows = -1;Di2015NewLine        if (conn == null) return totrows;Di2015NewLine        if (conn.State == System.Data.ConnectionState.Closed) conn.Open();Di2015NewLine        MySqlCommand cmd = new MySqlCommand(sql, conn);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            totrows = cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            cmd = null;Di2015NewLine            return totrows;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            err = ex.Message;Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool Restore(string dbHost, int dbPort, string dbUser, string dbPassword, string file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int toterr = 0;Di2015NewLine    int totsql = 0;Di2015NewLine    string msql = "";Di2015NewLine    StreamReader rd = null;Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = null;       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MySqlConnection conn = NewConnection(dbHost, dbPort, "", dbUser, dbPassword);Di2015NewLine    if (conn == null) return false;Di2015NewLine    int cur = 0;Di2015NewLine    int rows = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fs = new FileStream(file, FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine    rd = new StreamReader(fs);Di2015NewLine    while (rd.Peek() > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string t = rd.ReadLine().Trim();Di2015NewLine        if ((t == "") || (t.StartsWith("--"))) continue;Di2015NewLine        msql += t;Di2015NewLine        if (msql == ";") msql = "";Di2015NewLine        if (msql.EndsWith(";"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string s = msql.Remove(msql.Length - 1, 1).Trim();Di2015NewLine            msql = "";Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rows = ExecuteScript(conn, s);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                toterr++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cur++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    rd.Close();Di2015NewLine    rd = null;Di2015NewLine    fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    fs = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    conn.Close();Di2015NewLine    conn = null;Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7889543Di2015UniqueSeparatorRequest.IsLocal
7889792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Arrange(Graphics gr, ref float xmin, ref float ymin) {Di2015NewLine    // See how big this node is.Di2015NewLine    SizeF my_size = Data.GetSize(gr, MyFont);Di2015NewLine    // Recursively arrange our children,Di2015NewLine    // allowing room for this node.Di2015NewLine    float y = ymin + my_size.Height;Di2015NewLine    float biggest_xmin = xmin + my_size.Width;Di2015NewLine    float subtree_xmin = xmin + my_size.Width + Hoffset;Di2015NewLine    foreach(TreeNode<T> child in Children) {Di2015NewLine        // Arrange this child's subtree.Di2015NewLine        float child_xmin = subtree_xmin;Di2015NewLine        child.Arrange(gr, ref child_xmin, ref y);Di2015NewLine        // See if this increases the biggest ymin value.Di2015NewLine        if(biggest_xmin < child_xmin) biggest_xmin = child_xmin;Di2015NewLine        // Allow room before the next sibling.Di2015NewLine        y += Voffset;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Remove the spacing after the last child.Di2015NewLine    if(Children.Count > 0) y -= Voffset;Di2015NewLine    // See if this node is wider than the subtree under it.Di2015NewLine    float subtree_height = y - ymin;Di2015NewLine    if(my_size.Height > subtree_height) {Di2015NewLine        y = ymin + (my_size.Height - subtree_height) / 2;Di2015NewLine        foreach(TreeNode<T> child in Children) {Di2015NewLine            // Arrange this child's subtree.Di2015NewLine            child.Arrange(gr, ref subtree_xmin, ref y);Di2015NewLine            y += Voffset;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        subtree_height = my_size.Height;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Set this node's center position.Di2015NewLine    Center = new PointF(xmin + my_size.Width / 2, ymin + my_size.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine    ymin += subtree_height;Di2015NewLine    xmin = biggest_xmin;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7889792Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DrawSubtreeLinks(Graphics gr) {Di2015NewLine    foreach(TreeNode<T> child in Children) {Di2015NewLine        PointF p = new PointF(Center.X, child.Center.Y);Di2015NewLine        gr.DrawLine(MyPen, Center, p);Di2015NewLine        gr.DrawLine(MyPen, p, child.Center);Di2015NewLine        child.DrawSubtreeLinks(gr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7890397Di2015UniqueSeparator// Slightly more generic, although it's still requiring projections to string...Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> ApplyOrdering<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine                                              params Func<T, string>[] sorts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Argument validationDi2015NewLine    if (sorts.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IOrderedEnumerable<T> ordered = source.OrderBy(sorts[0]);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var ordering in sorts.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ordered = ordered.ThenBy(ordering);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ordered;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
