7893988Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Lab6BDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //DECLARATIONSDi2015NewLine            double circleArea;  // area of pizzaDi2015NewLine            double diameter; // diameter of the pizzaDi2015NewLine            double areaOfSlice; // area of the slicesDi2015NewLine            double radius; // half the diameter of the pizzaDi2015NewLine            double slices = 0; // number of pizza slicesDi2015NewLine            const int INPUT_MAX = 36; // maximum entry for diameterDi2015NewLine            const int DIAMETER_RANGE_EXTRA_LARGE = 30; // diameter range used to figure out slicesDi2015NewLine            const int DIAMETER_RANGE_LARGE = 24; // diameter range used to figure out slicesDi2015NewLine            const int DIAMETER_RANGE_MED = 16; // diameter range used to figure out slicesDi2015NewLine            const int INPUT_MIN = 12; // minimum entry for diameterDi2015NewLine            const int SLICES_LOW_DIAMETER = 8; // number of pizza slices based on diameterDi2015NewLine            const int SLICES_MID_DIAMETER = 12; // number of pizza slices based on diameterDi2015NewLine            const int SLICES_HIGH_DIAMETER = 16; // number of pizza slices based on diameterDi2015NewLine            const int SLICES_GIANT_DIAMETER = 24; // number of pizza slices based on diameter        Di2015NewLine            bool needInput = true; // does the program need input true or falseDi2015NewLine            const int END_PROGRAM = 0; // 0 ends the programDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // INPUTDi2015NewLine            // Prompt for and get keyboard inputDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("Please enter the diameter of your pizza: ");  // get user to input diameterDi2015NewLine            diameter = Convert.ToDouble(Console.ReadLine()); // read a line of text (string) from the keyboard, Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // convert that string to an double,Di2015NewLine            // assign the resulting value to diameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (diameter != END_PROGRAM && needInput) // Begin while loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // PROCESSINGDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // determine if diameter meets requirements of 12" to 36"Di2015NewLine                // if does not meet requirements show error message and have user enter in new diameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (diameter < INPUT_MIN || diameter > INPUT_MAX)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine( "\\nENTRY ERROR\\nPizza must have a diameter in the range of 12â? to 36â? inclusive!\\nPlease try again.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    needInput = false;Di2015NewLine                    // determine the number of slices based on diameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (diameter < DIAMETER_RANGE_MED)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        slices = (SLICES_LOW_DIAMETER);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (diameter < DIAMETER_RANGE_LARGE)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        slices = (SLICES_MID_DIAMETER);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (diameter < DIAMETER_RANGE_EXTRA_LARGE)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        slices = (SLICES_HIGH_DIAMETER);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        slices = (SLICES_GIANT_DIAMETER);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Clear(); // clears console to show new output linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //OUTPUTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("\\nA {0}\\" Pizza diameter: {0}\\".", diameter);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("\\n==============================================");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int slicesAddFour = 8; slicesAddFour <= slices; slicesAddFour += 4) // for each slicesDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // determine the area of the slicesDi2015NewLine                        radius = diameter / 2; // uses diameter to get radiusDi2015NewLine                        circleArea = Math.PI * Math.Pow(radius, 2); // uses math class to calculate circle area  Di2015NewLine                        areaOfSlice = Math.Round((circleArea / slicesAddFour), 2); // divides circle area by slices, takes the result of above calculation and roundsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("\\nCut in {0} slices results in an area of {1}\\" per slice.", slicesAddFour, areaOfSlice);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                } //end of elseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.Write("\\nPlease enter the diameter of your pizza (0 to exit): ");Di2015NewLine                diameter = Convert.ToDouble(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                Console.Clear(); // clears console to show new output linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // set the need input value back to true for new entryDi2015NewLine                needInput = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine             } // end of while loopDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7895999Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = new MyEventTriggeringClass();Di2015NewLine        var eventSource = new EventSource();Di2015NewLine        test.Attach(eventSource, "SomeEvent", "Hello World!");Di2015NewLine        eventSource.RaiseSomeEvent();Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyEventTriggeringClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private object _parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Attach(object eventSource, string eventName, object parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _parameter = parameter;Di2015NewLine        var sink = new DynamicMethod(Di2015NewLine            "sink",Di2015NewLine            null,Di2015NewLine            new[] { typeof(object), typeof(object), typeof(EventArgs) },Di2015NewLine            typeof(Program).Module);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var eventInfo = typeof(EventSource).GetEvent("SomeEvent");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ilGenerator = sink.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        var targetMethod = GetType().GetMethod("TargetMethod", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public, null, new Type[0], null);Di2015NewLine        ilGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0); // <-- loads 'this' (when sink is not static)Di2015NewLine        ilGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Call, targetMethod);Di2015NewLine        ilGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // SOLUTION: pass 'this' as the delegate target...Di2015NewLine        var handler = (EventHandler)sink.CreateDelegate(eventInfo.EventHandlerType, this);Di2015NewLine        eventInfo.AddEventHandler(eventSource, handler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void TargetMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Value of _parameter = " + _parameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EventSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler SomeEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RaiseSomeEvent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (SomeEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            SomeEvent(this, new EventArgs());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7896178Di2015UniqueSeparator<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>Di2015NewLine<Project xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003" ToolsVersion="4.0">Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<!--Di2015NewLineCreates empty 'dummy' files for any files that are specified but do not exist. Di2015NewLineTo be processed, the following must be true:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine1. The file is included in an ItemGroup called CanCreateDummy, e.g.Di2015NewLine      <ItemGroup>Di2015NewLine        <CanCreateDummy Include="SomeFile.cs" />Di2015NewLine      </ItemGroup>Di2015NewLine   If you want to specify a CanCreateDummy file in the .csproj file, you wouldDi2015NewLine   modify the above slightly as follows to prevent it appearing twice:Di2015NewLine      <ItemGroup>Di2015NewLine        <CanCreateDummy Include="SomeFile.cs">Di2015NewLine          <Visible>false</Visible>Di2015NewLine        </CanCreateDummy>Di2015NewLine      </ItemGroup>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine2. The file is included in the ItemGroup called None. This is normally performed Di2015NewLine   by adding the file to the project in the usual way through Visual Studio, and Di2015NewLine   then setting the file's Build Action property to None.Di2015NewLine-->Di2015NewLine<TargetDi2015NewLine  Name="CreateDummyFiles"Di2015NewLine  AfterTargets="BeforeBuild"Di2015NewLine    >Di2015NewLine<!--Di2015NewLineThis voodoo creates the intersection of 2 lists - @(CanCreateDummy) and @(None) Di2015NewLine(this latter item is defined in the project file). We want to create a filtered Di2015NewLinelist of all items that are in both these lists, which is called _ProjectDummyFiles.Di2015NewLineSee http://blogs.msdn.com/b/msbuild/archive/2006/05/30/610494.aspx for how the Di2015NewLineCondition voodoo works.Di2015NewLine-->Di2015NewLine<CreateItem Include="@(CanCreateDummy)" Condition="'%(Identity)' != ''  and '@(None)' != ''" >Di2015NewLine  <Output TaskParameter="Include" ItemName="_ProjectDummyFiles"/>Di2015NewLine</CreateItem>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<MessageDi2015NewLine    Text="Creating dummy settings file @(_ProjectDummyFiles)"Di2015NewLine    Condition=" !Exists('%(_ProjectDummyFiles.FullPath)')"Di2015NewLine        />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<TouchDi2015NewLine    AlwaysCreate="true"Di2015NewLine    Files="@(_ProjectDummyFiles)"Di2015NewLine    Condition=" !Exists('%(_ProjectDummyFiles.FullPath)')"Di2015NewLine        />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine</Target>Di2015NewLine</Project>Di2015NewLine

private static void OnCanDragChanged(DependencyObject dependencyObject, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var frameworkElement = (FrameworkElement)dependencyObject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((bool)e.NewValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseLeftButtonDown += OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonDown;Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseMove += OnFrameworkElementMouseMove;Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseLeftButtonUp += OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonUp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var parent = GetDragParent<FrameworkElement>(frameworkElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(XOffsetProperty, 0d);Di2015NewLine                frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(YOffsetProperty, 0d);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var pointRelativeToParent = frameworkElement.TranslatePoint(new Point(0, 0), parent);Di2015NewLine                frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(XOffsetProperty, pointRelativeToParent.X);Di2015NewLine                frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(YOffsetProperty, pointRelativeToParent.Y);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseLeftButtonDown -= OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonDown;Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseMove -= OnFrameworkElementMouseMove;Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.MouseLeftButtonUp -= OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonUp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var frameworkElement = (FrameworkElement)sender;Di2015NewLine        var parent = GetDragParent<FrameworkElement>(frameworkElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var previewBeginDragEventArgs = new RoutedEventArgs(PreviewBeginDragEvent);Di2015NewLine        frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(previewBeginDragEventArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (previewBeginDragEventArgs.Handled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SetIsDragInProgress(frameworkElement, true);Di2015NewLine        SetDragPoint(frameworkElement, e.GetPosition(parent));Di2015NewLine        frameworkElement.CaptureMouse();Di2015NewLine        frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(new RoutedEventArgs(BeginDragEvent));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnFrameworkElementMouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var frameworkElement = (FrameworkElement)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (frameworkElement.IsMouseCaptured)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var previewDragEventArgs = new RoutedEventArgs(PreviewDragEvent);Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(previewDragEventArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (previewDragEventArgs.Handled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var parent = GetDragParent<FrameworkElement>(frameworkElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var currentPointRelativeToParent = e.GetPosition(parent);Di2015NewLine            var dragPoint = GetDragPoint(frameworkElement);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(dragPoint.HasValue, "dragPoint should be set.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(XOffsetProperty, GetXOffset(frameworkElement) + (currentPointRelativeToParent.X - dragPoint.Value.X));Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.SetCurrentValue(YOffsetProperty, GetYOffset(frameworkElement) + (currentPointRelativeToParent.Y - dragPoint.Value.Y));Di2015NewLine            SetDragPoint(frameworkElement, currentPointRelativeToParent);Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(new RoutedEventArgs(DragEvent));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnFrameworkElementMouseLeftButtonUp(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var frameworkElement = (FrameworkElement)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (frameworkElement.IsMouseCaptured)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(new RoutedEventArgs(PreviewEndDragEvent));Di2015NewLine            SetDragPoint(frameworkElement, null);Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.ReleaseMouseCapture();Di2015NewLine            frameworkElement.RaiseEvent(new RoutedEventArgs(EndDragEvent));Di2015NewLine            SetIsDragInProgress(frameworkElement, false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T GetDragParent<T>(DependencyObject dependencyObject)Di2015NewLine        where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dragParent = GetDragParent(dependencyObject) as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (dragParent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return dragParent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parent = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(dependencyObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (parent != null && !(parent is T))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parent = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(parent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (T)parent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7900698Di2015UniqueSeparator    Dictionary<char, char[]> map = new Dictionary<char, char[]>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        {'1', num1},Di2015NewLine        {'2', num2} Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine
7900698Di2015UniqueSeparator    char[] curr = null;Di2015NewLine    char currChar = '-';Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine
7900698Di2015UniqueSeparator    void Print()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(curr[index]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7900698Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Form1_KeyPress(object sender, KeyPressEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (map.ContainsKey(e.KeyChar))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (curr == null || e.KeyChar != currChar)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curr = map[e.KeyChar];Di2015NewLine                index = 0;Di2015NewLine                currChar = e.KeyChar;Di2015NewLine                Print();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ++index;Di2015NewLine                if (index == curr.Length)Di2015NewLine                    index = 0;Di2015NewLine                Print();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7901411Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<List<Node>> GetLevels() {Di2015NewLine    List<Node> nodes = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    nodes.Add(Root);Di2015NewLine    List<List<Node>> result = new List<List<Node>>();Di2015NewLine    GetLevelsCore(nodes, result);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevoid GetLevelsCore(List<Node> nodes, List<List<Node>> result) {Di2015NewLine    if(result.Any(list => list.SequenceEqual(nodes))) return;Di2015NewLine    result.Add(nodes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(Node node in nodes) {Di2015NewLine        if(node.Children.Count != 0) {Di2015NewLine            List<Node> replacedNodes = new List<Node>(nodes);Di2015NewLine            int index = replacedNodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine            replacedNodes.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine            replacedNodes.InsertRange(index, node.Children);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GetLevelsCore(replacedNodes, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7901655Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlReader reader = new XmlReader("layout.xml");Di2015NewLineStack<IElement> currentRoot = new Stack<IElement>();Di2015NewLinecurrentRoot.Push(root);Di2015NewLinewhile(reader.Read())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get the element tagDi2015NewLine    if(reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       Debug.Assert(creators_.ContainsKey(reader.Name));  // must have it!Di2015NewLine       IElement newElement = creators_[reader.Name].Invoke(); // create itDi2015NewLine       newElement.LoadFromXml(reader);            // tell element to read itself inDi2015NewLine       currentRoot.Peek().Children.Add(newElement); // add to parentDi2015NewLine       currentRoot.Push(newElement);  // we are now new parentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if(reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.EndElement)Di2015NewLine       currentRoot.Pop();  // just pop it off!Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7903616Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic NpgsqlDataReader DoQuery()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool ownershipPassed = false;Di2015NewLine    NpgsqlConnection conn = GetConnectionCode();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        NpgsqlCommand c = new NpgsqlCommand(...);Di2015NewLine        NpgsqlDataReader dataread = c.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.CloseConnection);Di2015NewLine        ownershipPassed = true;Di2015NewLine        return dataread;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!ownershipPassed)//only if we didn't create the reader than takes charge of the connectionDi2015NewLine          conn.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7904109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataAccessBootstrapper : INinjectModuleBootstrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IList<INinjectModule> GetModules()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //this is where you will be considering priority of your modules.Di2015NewLine        return new List<INinjectModule>()Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       new DataObjectModule(),Di2015NewLine                       new RepositoryModule(),Di2015NewLine                       new DbConnectionModule()Di2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLine        //RepositoryModule cannot be loaded until DataObjectModule is loadedDi2015NewLine        //as it is depended on DataObjectModule and DbConnectionModule hasDi2015NewLine        //dependency on RepositoryModuleDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7904109Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar assemblies = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLinereturn BootstrapHelper.LoadNinjectKernel(assemblies);Di2015NewLine

7904594Di2015UniqueSeparator^      : Start of the StringDi2015NewLine[1-9]  : A single number between 1 and 9Di2015NewLine[0-9]* : Zero or more number(s) between 0 and 9 Di2015NewLine         ([0-9]? would match zero or one number and the String "100" would not match the regex)Di2015NewLine(      : Start of a groupDi2015NewLine\\.     : A pointDi2015NewLine[0-9]  : A single number between 0 and 9Di2015NewLine)?     : End of the group. The group must be repeated zero or one timeDi2015NewLine$      : End of the StringDi2015NewLine

7904863Di2015UniqueSeparator /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Parses each string passed as a "row".Di2015NewLine        /// This routine accounts for both double quotesDi2015NewLine        /// as well as commas currently, but can be added toDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="row"> string or row to be parsed</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private List<String> ParseRowToList(String row)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<String> returnValue = new List<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (row[0] == '\\"')Di2015NewLine            {// Quoted StringDi2015NewLine                if (row.IndexOf("\\",") > -1)Di2015NewLine                {// There are more columnsDi2015NewLine                    returnValue = ParseRowToList(row.Substring(row.IndexOf("\\",") + 2));Di2015NewLine                    returnValue.Insert(0, row.Substring(1, row.IndexOf("\\",") - 1));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {// This is the last columnDi2015NewLine                    returnValue.Add(row.Substring(1, row.Length - 2));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {// Unquoted StringDi2015NewLine                if (row.IndexOf(",") > -1)Di2015NewLine                {// There are more columnsDi2015NewLine                    returnValue = ParseRowToList(row.Substring(row.IndexOf(",") + 1));Di2015NewLine                    returnValue.Insert(0, row.Substring(0, row.IndexOf(",")));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {// This is the last columnDi2015NewLine                    returnValue.Add(row.Substring(0, row.Length));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return returnValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

7905101Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PointConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double val = (double)value;Di2015NewLine            int num = int.Parse("" + parameter);Di2015NewLine            if (num == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val < 50) return new Point(200 - val * 4, 200);Di2015NewLine                else return new Point(0, 200 - (val - 50) * 4);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (num == 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val < 50) return new Point(200 - val * 4, 200);Di2015NewLine                else return new Point(0, 200);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (num == 3)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new Point(200, 200);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (num == 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new Point(200, 100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (num == 5)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val < 25) return new Point(200 - val * 4, 100);Di2015NewLine                else return new Point(100, 100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (num == 6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val < 25) return new Point(200 - val * 4, 100);Di2015NewLine                else if (val < 75) return new Point(100, 100);Di2015NewLine                else return new Point(100, 200 - (val - 50) * 4);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Point();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7908828Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GenerateRandomValueDefault(int irRandValRange)//default min val 1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GenerateRandomValueMin(irRandValRange, 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int GenerateRandomValueMin(int irRandValRange, int irMinValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rand = GetRandom();Di2015NewLine    return rand.GetNext(irMinValue,irRandValRange)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//This is a global random number generator, it is only used to provide the seed for the local RNG's.Di2015NewLineprivate static Random GlobalRandom = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Random GetRandom()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (HttpContext.Current.Session["RNG"] == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //This lock is only hit the very first time the users Session state is used, every time after that it should use the cached local copy without taking the lock.Di2015NewLine        lock(GlobalRandom)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //We use the Global RNG for seed instead of the default because it uses time to seed by default, and if two people get a new Random() within the same time-slice they will have the same seed. This prevents that from happening.Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Session["RNG"] = new Random(GlobalRandom.Next());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Return the cached/new RNG.Di2015NewLine    return (Random)HttpContext.Current.Session["RNG"];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7908828Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int SeedCounter = 0;Di2015NewLineprivate readonly object SeedInitLock = new Object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Random GetRandom()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Do init the first time this function is ever called.Di2015NewLine    if(SeedCounter == -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //The first time the function is called everyone will try to update SeedCounter, but only the first Di2015NewLine        //thread to complete it will be the value everyone uses.Di2015NewLine        Random initRNG = new Random();Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref SeedCounter, initRNG.Next(), -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (SeedCounter < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Because Interlocked.Increment wraps the value to int.MinValue and Random(int) will take the absoluteDi2015NewLine        //value of the seed, we skip all of the negitive numbers and go to 0.Di2015NewLine        Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref SeedCounter, 0, int.MinValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int tempSeed = Interlocked.Increment(ref SeedCounter);Di2015NewLine    if (tempSeed < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //If tempSeed is negative we hit a edge case where SeedCounter wrapped around. We just call the functionDi2015NewLine        //again so we do not reuse a seed that was just used.Di2015NewLine        return GetRandom();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new Random(tempSeed);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7908983Di2015UniqueSeparatorlong

7910189Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> GetFilePlugins<T>(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> ret = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type typeT = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        Assembly ass = Assembly.LoadFrom(filename);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in ass.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!type.IsClass || type.IsNotPublic) continue;Di2015NewLine            if (typeT.IsAssignableFrom(type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T plugin = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine                ret.Add(plugin);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static List<T> GetDirectoryPlugins<T>(string dirname)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> ret = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    string[] dlls = Directory.GetFiles(dirname, "*.dll");Di2015NewLine    foreach (string dll in dlls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> dll_plugins = GetFilePlugins<T>(Path.GetFullPath(dll));Di2015NewLine        ret.AddRange(dll_plugins);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7911967Di2015UniqueSeparatorTextureBrush
7911967Di2015UniqueSeparator// set the light and dark overlay colorsDi2015NewLineColor c1 = Color.FromArgb(80, Color.Silver);Di2015NewLineColor c2 = Color.FromArgb(80, Color.DarkGray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set up the tile size - this will be 8x8 pixels, with each light/dark square being 4x4 pixelsDi2015NewLineint length = 8;Di2015NewLineint halfLength = length / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (Bitmap overlay = new Bitmap(length, length, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // draw the overlay - this will be a 2 x 2 grid of squares,Di2015NewLine    // alternating between colors c1 and c2Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < length; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < length; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((x < halfLength && y < halfLength) || (x >= halfLength && y >= halfLength)) Di2015NewLine                overlay.SetPixel(x, y, c1);Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine                overlay.SetPixel(x, y, c2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open the source imageDi2015NewLine    using (Image image = Image.FromFile(@"C:\\Users\\Public\\Pictures\\Sample Pictures\\homers_brain.jpg"))Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(image))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a brush from the overlay image, draw over the source image and save to a new imageDi2015NewLine        using (Brush overlayBrush = new TextureBrush(overlay))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            graphics.FillRectangle(overlayBrush, new Rectangle(new Point(0, 0), image.Size));Di2015NewLine            image.Save(@"C:\\Users\\Public\\Pictures\\Sample Pictures\\homers_brain_overlay.jpg");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7914162Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool Read(FileStream fs, byte[] data, long position)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    fs.Seek(position, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (fs.ReadByte() == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Block of data not finished writingDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fs.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool Write(FileStream fs, byte[] data, long position)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs.Lock(position, data.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine        fs.Seek(position, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        fs.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine        fs.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine        fs.Seek(position, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        fs.WriteByte(1);Di2015NewLine        fs.Unlock(position, data.Length + 1);Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (IOException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool Append(FileStream fs, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Write(fs, data, fs.Length);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7914301Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TagService : ITagServiceDi2015NewLine{      Di2015NewLine    public void ProcessTags<TEntity>(TEntity entity, Di2015NewLine        Func<IEnumerable<Tag>> featureTagsFactory, string tagString) where TEntity : ITagableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<Tag>();Di2015NewLine        // remove any leading/trailing spacesDi2015NewLine        tagString = tagString.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (tagString.IsNotNullOrEmpty())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.AddRange(from str in tagString.Split(new[] { ',' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries).Where(t => t.Length > 1).Distinct()Di2015NewLine                            join tag in featureTagsFactory() on (Slug)str equals tag.Slug into tagsDi2015NewLine                            from tag in tags.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                            select tag ?? new Tag(str.Trim()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // merge tagsDi2015NewLine        foreach (var tag in entity.Tags.Except(result)) // remove unmatched tagsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            entity.Untag(tag);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var tag in result) // entity should check if already addedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            entity.Tag(tag);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7922070Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void EncryptData(String inName, String outName, byte[] tdesKey, byte[] tdesIV)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    //Create the file streams to handle the input and output files.Di2015NewLine    FileStream fin = new FileStream(inName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine    FileStream fout = new FileStream(outName, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine    fout.SetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Create variables to help with read and write.Di2015NewLine    byte[] bin = new byte[100]; //This is intermediate storage for the encryption.Di2015NewLine    long rdlen = 0;              //This is the total number of bytes written.Di2015NewLine    long totlen = fin.Length;    //This is the total length of the input file.Di2015NewLine    int len;                     //This is the number of bytes to be written at a time.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider tdes = new TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider();          Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream encStream = new CryptoStream(fout, tdes.CreateEncryptor(tdesKey, tdesIV), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Encrypting...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Read from the input file, then encrypt and write to the output file.Di2015NewLine    while(rdlen < totlen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        len = fin.Read(bin, 0, 100);Di2015NewLine        encStream.Write(bin, 0, len);Di2015NewLine        rdlen = rdlen + len;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} bytes processed", rdlen);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encStream.Close();                     Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7922070Di2015UniqueSeparatorUSE AdventureWorks2008R2;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--If there is no master key, create one now. Di2015NewLineIF NOT EXISTS Di2015NewLine    (SELECT * FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE symmetric_key_id = 101)Di2015NewLine    CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY Di2015NewLine    PASSWORD = '23987hxJKL969#ghf0%94467GRkjg5k3fd117r$$#1946kcj$n44nhdlj'Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE CERTIFICATE HumanResources037Di2015NewLine   WITH SUBJECT = 'Employee Social Security Numbers';Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE SYMMETRIC KEY SSN_Key_01Di2015NewLine    WITH ALGORITHM = AES_256Di2015NewLine    ENCRYPTION BY CERTIFICATE HumanResources037;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUSE [AdventureWorks2008R2];Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Create a column in which to store the encrypted data.Di2015NewLineALTER TABLE HumanResources.EmployeeDi2015NewLine    ADD EncryptedNationalIDNumber varbinary(128); Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Open the symmetric key with which to encrypt the data.Di2015NewLineOPEN SYMMETRIC KEY SSN_Key_01Di2015NewLine   DECRYPTION BY CERTIFICATE HumanResources037;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Encrypt the value in column NationalIDNumber with symmetric Di2015NewLine-- key SSN_Key_01. 7922457Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IEnumerable<string> GetPermutations(string value) {Di2015NewLine        if (value.Length == 1) {Di2015NewLine            yield return value;Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < value.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine                string a = value[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine                foreach (string b in GetPermutations(value.Remove(i, 1))) {Di2015NewLine                    yield return a + b;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string test = "INEEDTOGETAHAIRCUT";Di2015NewLine        string chars = "OEGT";Di2015NewLine        foreach (string to_find in GetPermutations(chars)) {Di2015NewLine            int i = test.IndexOf(to_find);Di2015NewLine            if (i != -1) {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Found {0} at index {1}", to_find, i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

                     [b]some text [url=http://www.google.com]some link[/url][/b]  Di2015NewLine                        [/code]");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        class abstract class MatchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.Text;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public string Source { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public int Start { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public int Length { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public string Text { get { return this.Source.Substring(this.Start, this.Length); } }Di2015NewLine            protected abstract bool ParseInternal(ParseContext context);Di2015NewLine            public bool Parse(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = this.ParseInternal(context);Di2015NewLine                this.Length = context.Position -           this.Start = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                var result = this.ParseInternal(context);Di2015NewLine                this.Length = context.Position - this.Start;Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public static List<T> ParseList<T>(string source)Di2015NewLine                where T : Match, new()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var context = new ParseContextDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Position = 0,Di2015NewLine                    Source = sourceDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                var result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var item = new T { Source result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public static T ParseSingle<T>(string source)Di2015NewLine                where T : Match, new()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var context = new ParseContextDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Position = 0,Di2015NewLine                    Source = sourceDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                var result = new T { Source = source, Start = context.Position };Di2015NewLine                if (result.Parse(context))Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected List<T> ReadList<T>(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine                where T : Match, new()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var item = new T { Source = this.Source, Start = context.Position };Di2015NewLine                    if (!item.Parse(context))Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected T ReadSingle<T>(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine                where T : Match, new()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = new T { Source = this.Source, Start = context.Position };Di2015NewLine                if (result.Parse(context))Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected int ReadSpaces(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startPos = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                int cnt = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (startPos + cnt >= context.Source.Length)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    if (!char.IsWhiteSpace(context.Source[context.Position + cnt]))Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    cnt++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                context.Position = startPos + cnt;Di2015NewLine                return cnt;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected bool ReadChar(ParseContext context, char p)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startPos = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                if (startPos >= context.Source.Length)Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                if (context.Source[startPos] == p)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    context.Position = startPos + 1;Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        class Tag : MatchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            protected override bool ParseInternal(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startPos = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                if (!this.ReadChar(context, '['))Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                this.ReadSpaces(context);Di2015NewLine                if (this.ReadChar(context, '/'))Di2015NewLine                    this.IsEndTag = true;Di2015NewLine                this.ReadSpaces(context);Di2015NewLine                var validName = this.ReadValidName(context);Di2015NewLine                if (validName != null)Di2015NewLine                    this.Name = validName;Di2015NewLine                this.ReadSpaces(context);Di2015NewLine                if (this.ReadChar(context, ']'))Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                context.Position = startPos;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected string ReadValidName(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startPos = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                int endPos = startPos;Di2015NewLine                while (char.IsLetter(context.Source[endPos]))Di2015NewLine                    endPos++;Di2015NewLine                if (endPos == startPos) return null;Di2015NewLine                context.Position = endPos;Di2015NewLine                return context.Source.Substring(startPos, endPos - startPos);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public bool IsEndTag { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        class TagsGroup : MatchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public TagsGroup()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected TagsGroup(Tag openTag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Start = openTag.Start;Di2015NewLine                this.Source = openTag.Source;Di2015NewLine                this.OpenTag = openTag;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            protected override bool ParseInternal(ParseContext context)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var startPos = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                if (this.OpenTag == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.ReadSpaces(context);Di2015NewLine                    this.OpenTag = this.ReadSingle<Tag>(context);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (this.OpenTag != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int textStart = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                    int textLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while (true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Tag                    if (context.Position >= context.Source.Length)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                context.Position = startPos;Di2015NewLine                                return false;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            context.Position++;Di2015NewLine                            textLength++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        if (!tag.IsEndTag)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var tagGrpStart = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                            var tagGrup = new TagsGroup(tag);Di2015NewLine                            if (tagGrup.Parse(context))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (textLength > 0)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    if (this.Contents == null)                         textStart = context.Position;Di2015NewLine                                    textLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                this.Contents.Add(tagGrup);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                textLength += tag.Length;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                    textLength = 0;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                this.CloseTag = tag;Di2015NewLine                                return 7925632Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void MakeThumbnail(string imagePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Image exists?Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(imagePath)) throw new "_thumb.jpg");Di2015NewLine        int Width = 100; // 180;Di2015NewLine        int Height = 75; // 135;Di2015NewLine        bool lSaved = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Load      if (bitmap.Width <= Width && bitmap.Height <= Height)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bitmap.Save(Filename, ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine                lSaved =        Bitmap FinalBitmap = null;Di2015NewLine            // Making ThumbDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bitmap = new             // Change size of imageDi2015NewLine                Ratio = (decimal)Width / Height;Di2015NewLine                BitmapNewWidth = Width;Di2015NewLine                BitmapNewHeight = 7928172Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLinevar daysInMonth = DateTime.DaysInMonth(today.Year, today.Month);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar dates = Enumerable.Range(1, daysInMonth)Di2015NewLine                            .Select(n => new DateTime(today.Year, today.Month, n))Di2015NewLine                            .Where(date => date.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine                            .SkipWhile(date => date.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Monday)Di2015NewLine                            .TakeWhile(date => date.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Monday || (date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Monday && daysInMonth - date.Day > 7))Di2015NewLine                            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine
7928172Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateTime today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLine        int daysInMonth = DateTime.DaysInMonth(today.Year, today.Month);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<DateTime> dates = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool foundFirst = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int n = 1; n <= daysInMonth; n++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var date = new DateTime(today.Year, today.Month, n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Skip untill we find the first Monday of the month.Di2015NewLine            if (date.DayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.Monday && !foundFirst)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foundFirst = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add all days except Sundays. 7929990Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void traverse(ref XmlNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlNode prevOldElement = null;Di2015NewLine        XmlNode prevNewElement = null;Di2015NewLine        var element = node.FirstChild;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (prevNewElement != null && prevOldElement != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                prevOldElement.ParentNode.ReplaceChild(prevNewElement, prevOldElement);Di2015NewLine                prevNewElement = null;Di2015NewLine                prevOldElement = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (element.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Text)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var el = doc.CreateElement("text");Di2015NewLine                //Here is manuplation of the InnerXml.Di2015NewLine                el.InnerXml = element.Value.Replace(a_search_term, "<b>" + a_search_term + "</b>");Di2015NewLine                //I don't replace element right now, because element.NextSibling will be null.Di2015NewLine                //So I replace the new element after getting the next sibling.Di2015NewLine                prevNewElement = el;Di2015NewLine                prevOldElement = element;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (element.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                traverse(ref element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while ((element = element.NextSibling) != null);Di2015NewLine        if (prevNewElement != null && prevOldElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prevOldElement.ParentNode.ReplaceChild(prevNewElement, prevOldElement);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7929990Di2015UniqueSeparator</text>

7930234Di2015UniqueSeparator// Our FieldReference class that internally uses reflection to get or set a field value.Di2015NewLinepublic class FieldReference<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private object ownerObject;Di2015NewLine    private FieldInfo fieldInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FieldReference(object ownerObject, string fieldName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ownerObject = ownerObject;Di2015NewLine        this.fieldInfo = ownerObject.GetType().GetField(fieldName, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FieldReference(object ownerObject, FieldInfo fieldInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ownerObject = ownerObject;Di2015NewLine        this.fieldInfo = fieldInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (T)this.fieldInfo.GetValue(this.ownerObject); 7931353Di2015UniqueSeparator// This method accepts two strings the represent two files to Di2015NewLine// compare. A return value of 0 indicates that the contents of the filesDi2015NewLine// are the same. A return value of any other value indicates that the Di2015NewLine// files are not the same.Di2015NewLineprivate bool FileCompare(string file1, string file2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     int file1byte;Di2015NewLine     int file2byte;Di2015NewLine     FileStream fs1;Di2015NewLine     FileStream fs2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Determine if the same file was referenced two times.Di2015NewLine     if (file1 == file2)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          // Return true to indicate that the files are the same.Di2015NewLine          return true;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Open the two files.Di2015NewLine     fs1 = new FileStream(file1, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine     fs2 = new FileStream(file2, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Check the file sizes. If they are not the same, the files Di2015NewLine        // are not the same.Di2015NewLine     if (fs1.Length != fs2.Length)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          // Close the fileDi2015NewLine          fs1.Close();Di2015NewLine          fs2.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // Return false to indicate files are differentDi2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Read and compare a byte from each file until either aDi2015NewLine     // non-matching set of bytes is found or until the end ofDi2015NewLine     // file1 is reached.Di2015NewLine     do Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine          // Read one byte from each file.Di2015NewLine          file1byte = fs1.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine          file2byte = fs2.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     while ((file1byte == file2byte) && (file1byte != -1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Close the files.Di2015NewLine     fs1.Close();Di2015NewLine     fs2.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // Return the success of the comparison. "file1byte" is Di2015NewLine     // equal to "file2byte" at this point only if the files are Di2015NewLine     // the same.Di2015NewLine     return ((file1byte - file2byte) == 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

internal struct COLORREFDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal uint ColorDWORD;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal COLORREF(Color color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            ColorDWORD = r + (g << 8) + (b << 16);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal Color GetColor()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal void SetColor(Color color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ColorDWORD = (uint) color.R + (((uint) color.G) << 8) + (((uint) color.B) <<   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE = -11;                                        // per WinBase.hDi2015NewLine    internal static readonly IntPtr INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE = new CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO_EX csbe);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool SetConsoleScreenBufferInfoEx(IntPtr hConsoleOutput, ref CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO_EX csbe);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set a specific console color to an RGB colorDi2015NewLine    // The default console colors used are gray (foreground) and black (background)Di2015NewLine    public static int SetColor(ConsoleColor consoleColor, Color targetColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SetColor(consoleColor, targetColor.R, targetColor.G, targetColor.B);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int SetColor(ConsoleColor color, uint r, uint g, uint b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO_EX csbe = new CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO_EX();Di2015NewLine        csbe.cbSize = (int)Marshal.SizeOf(csbe);                    // 96 = 0x60Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hConsoleOutput = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);    // 7Di2015NewLine        if (hConsoleOutput == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bool brc = GetConsoleScreenBufferInfoEx(hConsoleOutput, ref csbe);Di2015NewLine        if (!brc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.DarkCyan:Di2015NewLine                csbe.darkCyan = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.DarkRed:Di2015NewLine                csbe.darkRed = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.DarkMagenta:Di2015NewLine                csbe.darkMagenta = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.DarkYellow:Di2015NewLine                csbe.darkYellow = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Gray:Di2015NewLine                csbe.gray = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.DarkGray:Di2015NewLine                csbe.darkGray = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Blue:Di2015NewLine                csbe.blue = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Green:Di2015NewLine                csbe.green = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Cyan:Di2015NewLine                csbe.cyan = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Red:Di2015NewLine                csbe.red = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Magenta:Di2015NewLine                csbe.magenta = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.Yellow:Di2015NewLine                csbe.yellow = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ConsoleColor.White:Di2015NewLine                csbe.white = new COLORREF(r, g, b);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ++csbe.srWindow.Bottom;Di2015NewLine        ++csbe.srWindow.Right;Di2015NewLine        brc = SetConsoleScreenBufferInfoEx(hConsoleOutput, ref csbe);Di2015NewLine        if (!brc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int SetScreenColors(Color foregroundColor, Color backgroundColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int irc;Di2015NewLine        irc = SetColor(ConsoleColor.Gray, foregroundColor);Di2015NewLine        if (irc != 0) return irc;Di2015NewLine        irc = SetColor(ConsoleColor.Black, backgroundColor);Di2015NewLine        if (irc != 0) return irc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7937272Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color screenTextColor = Color.Orange;Di2015NewLine        Color screenBackgroundColor = code = " + irc + " = 0x" + irc.ToString("x"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine("LargestWindowHeight=" + Console.LargestWindowHeight + " LargestWindowWidth=" + WindowWidth=" + Console.WindowWidth);Di2015NewLine        //// these are relative to the buffer, not the screen:Di2015NewLine        //Debug.WriteLine("WindowTop=" + Console.WindowTop + " WindowLeft=" + Console.WindowLeft);Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine("ForegroundColor=" + Console.ForegroundColor + " BackgroundColor=" + Console.BackgroundColor);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Some text in a console window");Di2015NewLine        Console.BackgroundColor = ConsoleColor.Cyan;Di2015NewLine        Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Yellow;Di2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine("ForegroundColor=" + Console.ForegroundColor + " BackgroundColor=" + Console.BackgroundColor);Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("Press ENTER to exit...");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Note: If you use SetScreenColors, the RGB values of gray and black are changed permanently for the console window.Di2015NewLine        // Using i.e. Console.ForegroundColor = ConsoleColor.Gray afterwards will switch the color to whatever you changed gray toDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // It's best to use SetColor for the purpose of choosing the 16 colors you want the console to be able to display, then useDi2015NewLine        // Console.BackgroundColor and Console.ForegrondColor to choose among them.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7938882Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> GetFilePlugins<T>(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> ret = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type typeT = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        Assembly ass = Assembly.LoadFrom(filename);Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in ass.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!type.IsClass || type.IsNotPublic) continue;Di2015NewLine            if (typeT.IsAssignableFrom(type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T plugin = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine                ret.Add(plugin);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static List<T> GetDirectoryPlugins<T>(string dirname)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> ret = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    string[] dlls = Directory.GetFiles(dirname, "*.dll");Di2015NewLine    foreach (string dll in dlls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> dll_plugins = GetFilePlugins<T>(Path.GetFullPath(dll));Di2015NewLine        ret.AddRange(dll_plugins);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7945094Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<RecentTag> GetRecentTags(int numberofdays)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime startdate = DateTime.Now.AddDays(-(numberofdays));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<RecentTag> tags = JobsDi2015NewLine        .Where(j => j.DatePosted > startdate) // Can't use DateTime.Now.AddDays in Entity query apparentlyDi2015NewLine        .SelectMany(j => j.Tags)Di2015NewLine        .GroupBy(t => t, (k, g) => new RecentTagDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TagID = k.TagID,Di2015NewLine            Name = k.Name,Di2015NewLine            Count = g.Count()Di2015NewLine        })Di2015NewLine        .OrderByDescending(g => g.Count)Di2015NewLine        .Select(a => a);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tags;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7945887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IPacketFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   IPacket CreatePacket();Di2015NewLine   IPacket CreatePacket(Client creator, DateTime creationTime, string data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MessageFactory : IPacketFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public CreatePacket()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return new Message();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public CreatePacket(Client creator, DateTime creationTime, string data)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return new Message(creator, creationTime, data);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//You'd implement factories for each IPacket type...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private IPacketFactory _factory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public Client(IPacketFactory factory)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      _factory = factory;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public SomeMethodThatNeedsToCreateIPacketInstance()Di2015NewLine   { Di2015NewLine      IPacket packet = _factory.CreatePacket();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     //work with packet without caring what type it isDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//a higher level class or IOC container would construct the client with the appropriate factoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineClient client = new Client(new MessageFactory());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the Client class can work with different IPacket instances without it having to change (it's decoupled)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineClient client2 = new Client(new LogFactory());Di2015NewLine

7949083Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction<T, Action<R>>
7949083Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<T, IObservable<R>>
7949083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ObservableExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Func<T, IObservable<R>> FromAsyncCallbackPattern<T, R>(Di2015NewLine        this Action<T, Action<R>> call)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (call == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("call");Di2015NewLine        return t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var subject = new AsyncSubject<R>();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Action<R> callback = r =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    subject.OnNext(r);Di2015NewLine                    subject.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                call(t, callback);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Observable.Throw<R>(ex, Scheduler.ThreadPool);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return subject.AsObservable<R>();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7953530Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Concat(params string[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int num = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (values == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("values");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string[] array = new string[values.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string text = values[i];Di2015NewLine        array[i] = ((text == null) ? string.Empty : text);Di2015NewLine        num += array[i].Length;Di2015NewLine        if (num < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new OutOfMemoryException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return string.ConcatArray(array, num);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7958183Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void BuildDocument(string fileName, List<string> text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  using (WordprocessingDocument wordDoc =Di2015NewLine    WordprocessingDocument.Create(fileName,Di2015NewLine    WordprocessingDocumentType.Document))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    MainDocumentPart mainPart = wordDoc.AddMainDocumentPart();Di2015NewLine    mainPart.Document = new Document();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Run run = new Run(); Di2015NewLine    foreach (string currText in text) // Add text to run.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Text currLine = new Text(currText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      run.AppendChild<Text>(currLine);Di2015NewLine      run.AppendChild<CarriageReturn>(new CarriageReturn());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Paragraph paragraph = new Paragraph(run);Di2015NewLine    Body body = new Body(paragraph);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mainPart.Document.Append(body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RunProperties runProp = new RunProperties(); // Create run properties.Di2015NewLine    RunFonts runFont = new RunFonts();           // Create fontDi2015NewLine    runFont.Ascii = "Arial";                     // Specify font familyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FontSize size = new FontSize();Di2015NewLine    size.Val = new StringValue("48");  // 48 half-point font sizeDi2015NewLine    runProp.Append(runFont);Di2015NewLine    runProp.Append(size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    run.PrependChild<RunProperties>(runProp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    mainPart.Document.Save();Di2015NewLine    wordDoc.Close();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7960466Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static long ComputeHashCode(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const ulong p = 1099511628211;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ulong hash = 14695981039346656037;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < url.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash = (hash ^ url[i]) * p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Wang64 bit mixerDi2015NewLine    hash = (~hash) + (hash << 21);Di2015NewLine    hash = hash ^ (hash >> 24);Di2015NewLine    hash = (hash + (hash << 3)) + (hash << 8);Di2015NewLine    hash = hash ^ (hash >> 14);Di2015NewLine    hash = (hash + (hash << 2)) + (hash << 4);Di2015NewLine    hash = hash ^ (hash >> 28);Di2015NewLine    hash = hash + (hash << 31);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hash == (ulong)UNKNOWN_RECORD_HASH)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ++hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (long)hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7966740Di2015UniqueSeparator  // Look, a two dimensional version.Di2015NewLine  int[][] numberArray = GetMyNumbers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Placeholder for the lowest averge / corresponding index.Di2015NewLine  double lowestAvg = double.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine  int lowestIndex = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < numberArray.Length; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int[] row = numberArray[rowIndex];Di2015NewLine      int n = row.Length;Di2015NewLine      int[] diffs = new int[(n * n) - n];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Get all of the differences.Di2015NewLine      int count = 0;Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          diffs[count] = Math.Abs(row[i] - row[j]);Di2015NewLine          count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Average them..Di2015NewLine      double sum = 0;Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < diffs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        sum += diffs[i];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      double avg = sum / diffs.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Compare to the lowest value, making note of a new low.Di2015NewLine      if (avg < lowestAvg)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        lowestAvg = avg;Di2015NewLine        lowestIndex = rowIndex;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Now that we are here, we know which index has the lowest average of differences.Di2015NewLine  // Do whatever you want with it.Di2015NewLine  int[] TheAnswer = numberArray[lowestIndex];Di2015NewLine

7967460Di2015UniqueSeparatorModalPopupExtender
7967550Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool DownloadFileMethod(HttpContext httpContext, string filePath, long speed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Many changes: mostly declare variables near useDi2015NewLine    // Extracted duplicate references to HttpContext.Response and .RequestDi2015NewLine    // also duplicate reference to .HttpMethodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removed try/catch blocks which hid any problemsDi2015NewLine    var response = httpContext.Response;Di2015NewLine    var request = httpContext.Request;Di2015NewLine    var method = request.HttpMethod.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    if (method != "GET" &&Di2015NewLine        method != "HEAD")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        response.StatusCode = 501;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(filePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        response.StatusCode = 404;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Stream implements IDisposable so should be in a using blockDi2015NewLine    using (var myFile = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fileLength = myFile.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (fileLength > Int32.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response.StatusCode = 413;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lastUpdateTiemStr = File.GetLastWriteTimeUtc(filePath).ToString("r");Di2015NewLine        var fileName = Path.GetFileName(filePath);Di2015NewLine        var fileNameUrlEncoded = HttpUtility.UrlEncode(fileName, Encoding.UTF8);Di2015NewLine        var eTag = fileNameUrlEncoded + lastUpdateTiemStr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ifRange = request.Headers["If-Range"];Di2015NewLine        if (ifRange != null && ifRange.Replace("\\"", "") != eTag)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response.StatusCode = 412;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long startBytes = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Just guessing, but I bet you want startBytes calculated beforeDi2015NewLine        // using to calculate content-lengthDi2015NewLine        var rangeHeader = request.Headers["Range"];Di2015NewLine        if (rangeHeader != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response.StatusCode = 206;Di2015NewLine            var range = rangeHeader.Split(new[] {'=', '-'});Di2015NewLine            startBytes = Convert.ToInt64(range[1]);Di2015NewLine            if (startBytes < 0 || startBytes >= fileLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // TODO: Find correct status codeDi2015NewLine                response.StatusCode = (int) HttpStatusCode.BadRequest;Di2015NewLine                response.StatusDescription =Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("Invalid start of range: {0}", startBytes);Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response.Clear();Di2015NewLine        response.Buffer = false;Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Content-MD5", GetMD5Hash(filePath));Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Accept-Ranges", "bytes");Di2015NewLine        response.AppendHeader("ETag", string.Format("\\"{0}\\"", eTag));Di2015NewLine        response.AppendHeader("Last-Modified", lastUpdateTiemStr);Di2015NewLine        response.ContentType = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", "attachment;filename=" +Di2015NewLine                                                    fileNameUrlEncoded.Replace("+", "%20"));Di2015NewLine        var remaining = fileLength - startBytes;Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Content-Length", remaining.ToString());Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader("Connection", "Keep-Alive");Di2015NewLine        response.ContentEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (startBytes > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response.AddHeader("Content-Range",Di2015NewLine                                string.Format(" bytes {0}-{1}/{2}", startBytes, fileLength - 1, fileLength));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // BinaryReader implements IDisposable so should be in a using blockDi2015NewLine        using (var br = new BinaryReader(myFile))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            br.BaseStream.Seek(startBytes, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int packSize = 1024*10; //read in blockï¼every block 10K bytesDi2015NewLine            var maxCount = (int) Math.Ceiling((remaining + 0.0)/packSize); //download in blockDi2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < maxCount && response.IsClientConnected; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                response.BinaryWrite(br.ReadBytes(packSize));Di2015NewLine                response.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // HACK: Unexplained sleepDi2015NewLine                var sleep = (int) Math.Ceiling(1000.0*packSize/speed); //the number of millisecondDi2015NewLine                if (sleep > 1) Thread.Sleep(sleep);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7968390Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<string> GetVariations(string input, int limit,char[] characters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(limit==0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    yield return input;Di2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if(limit>input.Length)//Disallows fewer than `limit` changes.Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  string remainder=input.SubString(1);Di2015NewLine  foreach(char c in characters)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int remainingLimit;Di2015NewLine    if(c==input[0])Di2015NewLine      remainingLimit=limit;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      remainingLimit=limit-1;Di2015NewLine    foreach(string variedRemainder in GetVariations(remainder,remainingLimit,characters)Di2015NewLine      yield return c+variedRemainder;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<int> GetVariations(int input, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return GetVariations(input.ToString(),count,new char[]{'0',...,'9'}).Select(int.Parse).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
