7969468Di2015UniqueSeparator// System.Linq.EnumerableDi2015NewLinepublic static int Count<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    checkedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ICollection<TSource> collection = source as ICollection<TSource>;Di2015NewLine        if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return collection.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ICollection collection2 = source as ICollection;Di2015NewLine        if (collection2 != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return collection2.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int num = 0;Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7973652Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] StringToArray(string input) {Di2015NewLine    var pattern = new Regex(@"Di2015NewLine        \\[Di2015NewLine            (?:Di2015NewLine            \\s*Di2015NewLine                (?<results>(?:Di2015NewLine                (?(open)  [^\\[\\]]+  |  [^\\[\\],]+  )Di2015NewLine                |(?<open>\\[)Di2015NewLine                |(?<-open>\\])Di2015NewLine                )+)Di2015NewLine                (?(open)(?!))Di2015NewLine            ,?Di2015NewLine            )*Di2015NewLine        \\]Di2015NewLine    ", RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the first match:Di2015NewLine    var result = pattern.Match(input);Di2015NewLine    if (result.Success) {Di2015NewLine        // Extract the captured values:Di2015NewLine        var captures = result.Groups["results"].Captures.Cast<Capture>().Select(c => c.Value).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        return captures;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Not a matchDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7973798Di2015UniqueSeparatorCompressFolder
7973798Di2015UniqueSeparatorCompressFolder
7973798Di2015UniqueSeparator    using System.IO.IsolatedStorage;Di2015NewLine    using ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip;Di2015NewLine    using ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Core;Di2015NewLine    using System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Recurses down the folder structureDi2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    private void CompressFolder(string path, ZipOutputStream zipStream, int folderOffset, IsolatedStorageFile isf)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] files = isf.GetFileNames(System.IO.Path.Combine(path, "*.*"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string filename in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string filenameWithPath = System.IO.Path.Combine(path, filename);Di2015NewLine            string entryName = filenameWithPath.Substring(folderOffset); // Makes the name in zip based on the folderDi2015NewLine            entryName = ZipEntry.CleanName(entryName); // Removes drive from name and fixes slash directionDi2015NewLine            ZipEntry newEntry = new ZipEntry(entryName);Di2015NewLine            newEntry.DateTime = isf.GetLastWriteTime(filenameWithPath).DateTime; // Note the zip format stores 2 second granularityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // To permit the zip to be unpacked by built-in extractor in WinXP and Server2003, WinZip 8, Java, and other older code,Di2015NewLine            // you need to do one of the following: Specify UseZip64.Off, or set the Size.Di2015NewLine            // If the file may be bigger than 4GB, or you do not need WinXP built-in compatibility, you do not need either,Di2015NewLine            // but the zip will be in Zip64 format which not all utilities can understand.Di2015NewLine            //   zipStream.UseZip64 = UseZip64.Off;Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream stream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(filenameWithPath, System.IO.FileMode.Open, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newEntry.Size = stream.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            zipStream.PutNextEntry(newEntry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Zip the file in buffered chunksDi2015NewLine            // the "using" will close the stream even if an exception occursDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream streamReader = isf.OpenFile(filenameWithPath, System.IO.FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StreamUtils.Copy(streamReader, zipStream, buffer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            zipStream.CloseEntry();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string[] folders = isf.GetDirectoryNames(System.IO.Path.Combine(path, "*.*"));Di2015NewLine        foreach (string folder in folders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CompressFolder(System.IO.Path.Combine(path, folder), zipStream, folderOffset, isf);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Compresses the files in the nominated folder, and creates a zip file on disk named as outPathname.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    public void CreateZip(string outPathname, string password, string folderName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFile isf = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream fsOut = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(outPathname, System.IO.FileMode.Create, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ZipOutputStream zipStream = new ZipOutputStream(fsOut);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine Null is the same as not setting.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // This setting will strip the leading part of the folder path in the entries, toDi2015NewLine                // make the entries relative to the starting folder.Di2015NewLine                // To include the full path for each entry up to the drive root, assign folderOffset = 0.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // int folderOffset = folderName.Length + (folderName.EndsWith("\\\\") ? 0 : 1); // hu: currently not used for WP7 sampleDi2015NewLine                int folderOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                CompressFolder(folderName, zipStream, folderOffset, isf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                zipStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IsolatedStorageFile isf = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isf.CreateDirectory(@"root");Di2015NewLine            isf.CreateDirectory(@"root\\subfolder1");Di2015NewLine            isf.CreateDirectory(@"root\\subfolder2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream stream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(@"root\\file0.txt", System.IO.FileMode.Create, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] bytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes("hello");Di2015NewLine                stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream stream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(@"root\\subfolder1\\file1.txt", System.IO.FileMode.Create, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] bytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes("zip");Di2015NewLine                stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (IsolatedStorageFileStream stream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(@"root\\subfolder2\\file2.txt", System.IO.FileMode.Create, isf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] bytes = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes("world");Di2015NewLine                stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        CreateZip("root.zip", null, "root");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7974789Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble calculateRateOfReturn(double rate, int periods) {Di2015NewLine  double RoR = 1.0;Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < periods; i++) {Di2015NewLine    RoR = RoR * (1.0 + rate);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return RoR - 1.0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7979525Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetRange(short startIndex, short endIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*CasesDi2015NewLine         * end > startDi2015NewLine         * end > boundsDi2015NewLine         * start < boundsDi2015NewLine         * start != endDi2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        if (startIndex > endIndex || endIndex > Months.Length || startIndex < 0 || startIndex == endIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex", "Invalid arguments were supplied for Start and End Index");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int rangeCount = startIndex-1; rangeCount < endIndex; rangeCount++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Months[rangeCount];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7982265Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static double CalculateAverageLightness(Bitmap bm)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double lum = 0;Di2015NewLine        var tmpBmp = new Bitmap(bm);Di2015NewLine        var width = bm.Width;Di2015NewLine        var height = bm.Height;Di2015NewLine        var bppModifier = bm.PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb ? 3 : 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var srcData = tmpBmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bm.Width, bm.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bm.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        var stride = srcData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        var scan0 = srcData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Luminance (standard, objective): (0.2126*R) + (0.7152*G) + (0.0722*B)Di2015NewLine        //Luminance (perceived option 1): (0.299*R + 0.587*G + 0.114*B)Di2015NewLine        //Luminance (perceived option 2, slower to calculate): sqrt( 0.241*R^2 + 0.691*G^2 + 0.068*B^2 )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        unsafeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* p = (byte*)(void*)scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int idx = (y * stride) + x * bppModifier;Di2015NewLine                    lum += (0.299*p[idx + 2] + 0.587*p[idx + 1] + 0.114*p[idx]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tmpBmp.UnlockBits(srcData);Di2015NewLine        tmpBmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        var avgLum = lum / (width * height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return avgLum/255.0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7990455Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void JustDoIt(double[] x, double[] y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Array.Sort(x);Di2015NewLine    Array.Sort(y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool mustContinue = true;Di2015NewLine    bool isXTurns;Di2015NewLine    bool withinTolerance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastBase_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastBase_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastMatch_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastMatch_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int current_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int current_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int matchedCount_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int matchedCount_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double yourTolerance = 0.001;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (mustContinue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isXTurns = x[current_x] <= y[current_y];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isXTurns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            withinTolerance = (y[current_y] - x[current_x] <= yourTolerance);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            withinTolerance = (x[current_x] - y[current_y] <= yourTolerance);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (withinTolerance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (isXTurns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (current_x > lastMatch_x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_x++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_x = current_x;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_y > lastMatch_y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_y++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_y = current_y;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_y + 1 < y.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_y++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (current_x + 1 < x.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_x++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mustContinue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (current_y > lastMatch_y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_y++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_y = current_y;Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_x > lastMatch_x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_x++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_x = current_x;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_x + 1 < x.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_x++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (current_y + 1 < y.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_y++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mustContinue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (isXTurns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastBase_x++;Di2015NewLine                mustContinue = lastBase_x < x.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastBase_y++;Di2015NewLine                mustContinue = lastBase_y < y.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            current_x = lastBase_x;Di2015NewLine            current_y = lastBase_y;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7990455Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void JustDoIt<T>(IEnumerable<T> items_x, IEnumerable<T> items_y, out int matchedCount_x, out int matchedCount_y, IComparer<T> comparer, Func<T, T, bool> toleranceReferee)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T[] x = items_x.OrderBy(item => item, comparer).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    T[] y = items_y.OrderBy(item => item, comparer).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool mustContinue = true;Di2015NewLine    bool isXTurns;Di2015NewLine    bool withinTolerance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastBase_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastBase_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastMatch_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int lastMatch_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int current_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int current_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    matchedCount_x = 0;Di2015NewLine    matchedCount_y = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (mustContinue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isXTurns = comparer.Compare(x[current_x], y[current_y]) <= 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        withinTolerance = toleranceReferee(x[current_x], y[current_y]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (withinTolerance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (isXTurns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (current_x > lastMatch_x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_x++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_x = current_x;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_y > lastMatch_y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_y++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_y = current_y;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_y + 1 < y.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_y++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (current_x + 1 < x.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current_x++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mustContinue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (current_y > lastMatch_y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_y++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_y = current_y;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (current_x > lastMatch_x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    matchedCount_x++;Di2015NewLine                    lastMatch_x         }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mustContinue = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine 7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorN
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsqrt(N)
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> GeneratePrimes(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var primes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine  for(var i = 2; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var ok = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach(var prime in primes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (prime * prime > i)Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      if (i % prime == 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        ok = false;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(ok)Di2015NewLine      primes.Add(i);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return primes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparator10^6 - 0.297sDi2015NewLine10^7 - 6.202sDi2015NewLine10^8 - 141.860sDi2015NewLine
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsqrt(N)
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsqrt(N) + 1
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorN
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorsqrt(N)
7992984Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> GeneratePrimesParallel(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var sqrt = (int) Math.Sqrt(n);Di2015NewLine      var lowestPrimes = GeneratePrimes(sqrt);Di2015NewLine      var highestPrimes =  (Enumerable.Range(sqrt + 1, n - sqrt)Di2015NewLine                                .AsParallel()Di2015NewLine                                .Where(i => lowestPrimes.All(prime => i % prime != 0)));Di2015NewLine      return lowestPrimes.Concat(highestPrimes).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

private Thread mKeyBoardReadThread = null;Di2015NewLine        private Boolean mKeyState = false;Di2015NewLine        private Key mKeyOfInterest;Di2015NewLine        private string running = "ONLY ONE    mKeyBoardReadThread.Abort();Di2015NewLine                mKeyBoardReadThread = null;Di2015NewLine                return mKeyState;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void GetKeyState()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mKeyState = Keyboard.IsKeyDown(mKeyOfInterest);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7994573Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ITestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Test1 : ITestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Test2 : ITestDi2015NewLine{ }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<ITest> list = new List<Test1>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.Add(new Test1());Di2015NewLine    list.Add(new Test2());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7994573Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<ITest> list = new List<ITest>();
7994674Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the dynamic references.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The source.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="assemblyDllPath">The assembly DLL path.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private string[] GetDynamicReferences(string source, string assemblyDllPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var filenames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string startRegion = "#region References";Di2015NewLine        const string endRegion = "#endregion";Di2015NewLine        const string commentStart = "/*";Di2015NewLine        const string commentEnd = "*/";Di2015NewLine        const string commentLine = "//";Di2015NewLine        const string libpath = "/libpath";Di2015NewLine        var sourceReader = new StringReader(source);Di2015NewLine        string currentLine;Di2015NewLine        bool inReferenceRegion = false;Di2015NewLine        bool inReferenceCommentRegion = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop over the lines in the script and check each line individually.Di2015NewLine        while ((currentLine = sourceReader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Strip the current line of all trailing spaces.Di2015NewLine            currentLine = currentLine.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if we're entering the region 'References'.Di2015NewLine            if (currentLine.StartsWith(startRegion))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                inReferenceRegion = true;   // We're entering the region, set the flag.Di2015NewLine                continue;                   // Skip to the next line.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if we're exiting the region 'References'. If so, stop the for loop.Di2015NewLine            if (currentLine.StartsWith(endRegion)) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we're processing a line that's not in the 'References' region, then skip the lineDi2015NewLine            // as we're only interested in the lines from that region.Di2015NewLine            if (!inReferenceRegion) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if we're entering the comments section, because the entire region is actuallyDi2015NewLine            // a big comment block, starting with /*Di2015NewLine            if (currentLine.StartsWith(commentStart))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                inReferenceCommentRegion = true;    // We're entering the comment block.Di2015NewLine                continue;                           // Skip to the next line.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if we're leaving the comments section, because then we're almost done parsingDi2015NewLine            // the entire comment block.Di2015NewLine            if (currentLine.EndsWith(commentEnd))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                inReferenceCommentRegion = false;   // Leaving the comment block.Di2015NewLine                continue;                           // Skip to the next line.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the line we're processing starts with a comment '//', then skip the line because it'sDi2015NewLine            // not to be processed anymore by us, just as if it was placed in comment in real code.Di2015NewLine            // If the line contains a double slash, strip one of the slashes from it and parse the data.Di2015NewLine            if (currentLine.Contains(commentLine))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (currentLine.StartsWith(commentLine)) continue;Di2015NewLine                currentLine = currentLine.Substring(0, currentLine.IndexOf(commentLine) - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we're dealing with a line that's not inside the reference comment section, skip itDi2015NewLine            // because we're only interested in the lines inside the comment region section of the script.Di2015NewLine            if (!inReferenceCommentRegion) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Trim the current line of all trailing spaces, the line should represent either the fullpathDi2015NewLine            // to a DLL, the librarypath option, or the relative path of a DLL.Di2015NewLine            string line = currentLine.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the line starts with the library option, then we need to extract this information, and store itDi2015NewLine            // inside the local varialbe that holds the libpath.Di2015NewLine            if (line.Equals(libpath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string dataHomeFolder = Api2.Factory.CreateApi().Parameters.Read(343).Value;Di2015NewLine                string companyName = Api2.Factory.CreateApi().Parameters.Read(113).Value;Di2015NewLine                _libraryPath = Path.Combine(dataHomeFolder, companyName, "libraries");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the line is not an absolute path to the referenced DLL, then we need to assume that the DLL residesDi2015NewLine            // in the library path. We'll build up the full path using the library path, if the path has been set.Di2015NewLine            if (!Path.IsPathRooted(line) && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(_libraryPath))Di2015NewLine                line = Path.Combine(_libraryPath, line);                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the file exists, then we'll add it as reference to the collection to be used by the compiler.Di2015NewLine            // We will not copy the file however in the bin folder of the application.Di2015NewLine            var fio = new FileInfo(line);Di2015NewLine            if (fio.Exists && !filenames.Contains(line)) filenames.Add(line);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the entire collection of libraries.Di2015NewLine        return filenames.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7994674Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>This function performs the compile operation and return the compiled assembly.</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The source code of the script to compile.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="libs">A collection of additional libraries to compile the script.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The compiled assembly.</returns>Di2015NewLine    internal Assembly Compile(string source, List<string> libs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var libraries = new List<string>(libs);Di2015NewLine        CodeDomProvider codeProvider = new CSharpCodeProvider(new Dictionary<string, string> { { "CompilerVersion", "v4.0" } });Di2015NewLine        var compilerParams = new CompilerParametersDi2015NewLine                                 {Di2015NewLine                                     CompilerOptions = "/target:library /optimize",Di2015NewLine                                     GenerateExecutable = false,Di2015NewLine                                     GenerateInMemory = true,Di2015NewLine                                     IncludeDebugInformation = true,Di2015NewLine                                     TreatWarningsAsErrors = falseDi2015NewLine                                 };Di2015NewLine        string assemblyDllPath = Path.GetDirectoryName(new Uri(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().CodeBase).LocalPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Load all the required assemblies depending on the api implementation.Di2015NewLine        LoadAssemblies(compilerParams, source, assemblyDllPath, libraries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var path = Path.Combine(Path.GetTempPath(), "TF-" + Guid.NewGuid().ToString().ToUpper());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // replace resx-files from provided libraries with compatible dll'sDi2015NewLine        var resxs = libraries.FindAll(lb => lb.EndsWith(".resx", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine        var tmpFiles = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        if (resxs.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(path)) Directory.CreateDirectory(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var resx in resxs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the resources filenameDi2015NewLine                var resourceFilename = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(resx);Di2015NewLine                var filename = Path.Combine(path, resourceFilename + ".resources");Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(filename);Di2015NewLine                tmpFiles.Add(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a ResXResourceReader for the file items.resx.Di2015NewLine                Stream stream = File.Open(resx, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read);Di2015NewLine                var rsxr = new ResXResourceReader(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create a ResXResourceReader for the file items.resources.Di2015NewLine                IResourceWriter writer = new ResourceWriter(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Iterate through the resources and add resources to the resource writer.Di2015NewLine                IDictionary dictionary = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (DictionaryEntry d in rsxr)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var k = d.Key.ToString();Di2015NewLine                    var v = d.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    dictionary.Add(k, v);Di2015NewLine                    writer.AddResource(k, v);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Close the reader.Di2015NewLine                rsxr.Close();Di2015NewLine                stream.Close();Di2015NewLine                writer.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                compilerParams.EmbeddedResources.Add(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string[] errors;Di2015NewLine                var provider = new CSharpCodeProvider(); // c#-code compilerDi2015NewLine                var cu = StronglyTypedResourceBuilder.Create(dictionary, resourceFilename ?? string.Empty, "", provider, false, out errors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var options = new CodeGeneratorOptionsDi2015NewLine                                  {Di2015NewLine                                      BracingStyle = "C",Di2015NewLine                                      BlankLinesBetweenMembers = false,Di2015NewLine                                      IndentString = "\\t"Di2015NewLine                                  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var tw = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine                provider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit(cu, tw, options);Di2015NewLine                var libCode = tw.ToString();Di2015NewLine                tw.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (!libraries.Contains(libCode))Di2015NewLine                    libraries.Add(libCode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            libraries.RemoveAll(lb => lb.EndsWith(".resx", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // actually compile the codeDi2015NewLine        CompilerResults results = codeProvider.CompileAssemblyFromSource(compilerParams, new List<string>(libraries) { source }.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // remove the temporary filesDi2015NewLine        foreach (var file in tmpFiles)Di2015NewLine            File.Delete(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // remove the resource directoryDi2015NewLine        if(Directory.Exists(path)) Directory.Delete(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.HasErrors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sb = new StringBuilder("Compilation error :\\n\\t");Di2015NewLine            foreach (CompilerError error in results.Errors)Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("\\t" + error.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get a hold of the actual assembly that was generatedDi2015NewLine        Assembly generatedAssembly = results.CompiledAssembly;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // move to some app startup place (this only needs to be set once)Di2015NewLine        if (!API.Factory.IsAPIImplementationTypeSet)Di2015NewLine        { API.Factory.SetAPIImplementation(Assembly.LoadFile(assemblyDllPath + "\\\\TenForce.Execution.API.Implementation.dll").GetType("TenForce.Execution.API.Implementation.API")); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the implementation type for the API2 as well. This should only be set once.Di2015NewLine        if (!Api2.Factory.ImplementationSet)Di2015NewLine        { Api2.Factory.SetImplementation(Assembly.LoadFile(assemblyDllPath + "\\\\TenForce.Execution.Api2.Implementation.dll").GetType("TenForce.Execution.Api2.Implementation.Api")); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return generatedAssembly;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8000581Di2015UniqueSeparatorStreamWriter
8000581Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void SerializeAndEncrypt<T>(T data)Di2015NewLine{                Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  _toEncrypt = memoryStreamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine  cryptoStreamWriter.Write(_toEncrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Flush your stream writer. So all bufferedDi2015NewLine  // data get written to the underlying device.Di2015NewLine  cryptoStreamWriter.Flush(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T DecryptAndDeserialize<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  _decrypted = cryptoStreamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine  memoryStreamWriter.Write(_decrypted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Flush buffered data.Di2015NewLine  memoryStreamWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  memoryStream.Position = 0L;Di2015NewLine  var serializer = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine  var result = (T)serializer.ReadObject(memoryStream);Di2015NewLine  memoryStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  cryptoStream.Close();Di2015NewLine  fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8000891Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool IsMoreWest(double longitudeA, double logitudeB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double difference = longitudeA - logitudeB;Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(difference) > 180.0) {Di2015NewLine        difference = -Math.Sign(difference) * (360.0 - Math.Abs(difference));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return difference < 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8000947Di2015UniqueSeparatoruniform float4x4 xWorldViewProjection;Di2015NewLineuniform float3 xCursorPos;Di2015NewLineuniform float  xCursorRadio;Di2015NewLineuniform float4 xLightColor = float4(0.8, 0.8, 0.8,1);Di2015NewLineuniform float4 xAmbientFactor = 0.4f;Di2015NewLineuniform float3 xCamPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineuniform int xCursorType=0;  // 0: Circle  1: BoxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid VS_Basico(Di2015NewLine    in float4 inPos : POSITION,Di2015NewLine    in float3 inNormal : NORMAL0, Di2015NewLine    in float4 inColor : COLOR0, Di2015NewLine    out float4 outPos: POSITION, Di2015NewLine    out float3 outNormal:TEXCOORD1,Di2015NewLine    out float3 outPos2 : TEXCOORD0,Di2015NewLine    out float4 outColor: COLOR0Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    outPos = mul (inPos, xWorldViewProjection); Di2015NewLine    outNormal = inNormal;Di2015NewLine    outPos2 = inPos.xyz;Di2015NewLine    outColor = inColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat4 PS_CursorPerPixelCircular ( in float4 inColor : COLOR, in float3 inPos:TEXCOORD0 ) : COLORDi2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    float f = distance(inPos, xCursorPos);Di2015NewLine    float4 outColor = inColor;Di2015NewLine    if (f<xCursorRadio) {Di2015NewLine        outColor=lerp(float4(0,1,1,1), inColor, 0.4) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return outColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat4 PS_CursorPerPixelCuadrado ( in float4 inColor : COLOR, in float3 inPos:TEXCOORD0 ) : COLORDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float3 size = float3(xCursorRadio,xCursorRadio,xCursorRadio);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float3 minSize = xCursorPos - size;Di2015NewLine    float3 maxSize = xCursorPos + size;Di2015NewLine    float4 outColor = inColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (inPos.x>=minSize.x && inPos.x<=maxSize.x && inPos.y>=minSize.y && inPos.y<=maxSize.y && inPos.z>=minSize.z && inPos.z<=maxSize.z )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            outColor=lerp(float4(0,1,1,1), inColor, 0.4) ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return outColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid PS_Basico( Di2015NewLine    in float4 inColor : COLOR0,Di2015NewLine    in float3 inPos:TEXCOORD0,Di2015NewLine    in float3 inNormal:TEXCOORD1,Di2015NewLine    out float4 outColor: COLOR0 Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float3 xLightPos = float3(40, 40, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float3 LightDir = normalize(inPos - xLightPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float3 reflectionVector = reflect(LightDir, inNormal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float3 eyeVector = inPos - xCamPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float specular = dot(normalize(reflectionVector), normalize(eyeVector));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    specular = pow(specular, 256); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float difusse_factor = -dot(normalize(inNormal), LightDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (difusse_factor<0) difusse_factor = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float4 col = inColor * xAmbientFactor + inColor * difusse_factor * xLightColor; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (xCursorType ==0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        col = PS_CursorPerPixelCircular(col, inPos);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        col = PS_CursorPerPixelCuadrado(col, inPos);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    col.a = 1;  Di2015NewLine    col.rgb += specular;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/*  col.xyz = col.xyz * (inPos.y+1) / 2; Di2015NewLine    col.y = 2*col.x;Di2015NewLine    col.z = 2*col.x;Di2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    outColor = col;Di2015NewLine    //outColor = float4(inNormal, 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine//--- TECNIQUES -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetechnique ColoredWiredDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    pass Pass0Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        VertexShader = compile vs_2_0 VS_Basico();Di2015NewLine        PixelShader  = compile ps_2_0 PS_Basico();Di2015NewLine        FILLMODE = WIREFRAME;       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetechnique ColoredSolidDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    pass Pass0Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        VertexShader = compile vs_2_0 VS_Basico();Di2015NewLine        PixelShader  = compile ps_2_0 PS_Basico();Di2015NewLine        FILLMODE = SOLID;       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

8004466Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Employee> Handle(string filePath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Employee> empLst = new List<Employee>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ExcelParser exlParser = new ExcelParser();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (exlParser.Load(filePath))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int rowCount = exlParser.GetRowCount();Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 2; i <= rowCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Employee emp = new Employee();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        emp.FirstName = exlParser.GetValue(i, 1);Di2015NewLine                        emp.LastName  = exlParser.GetValue(i, 2);Di2015NewLine                        emp.EmpID     = exlParser.GetValue(i, 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        empLst.Add(emp);                       Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception exp)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                exlParser.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return empLst;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

8004486Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static string spintax(Random rnd, string str) {Di2015NewLine            // Loop over string until all patterns exhausted.Di2015NewLine            string pattern = "{[^{}]*}";Di2015NewLine            Match m = Regex.Match(str, pattern);Di2015NewLine            while (m.Success) {Di2015NewLine                // Get random choice and replace pattern match.Di2015NewLine                string seg = str.Substring(m.Index + 1, m.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine                string[] choices = seg.Split('|');Di2015NewLine                str = str.Substring(0, m.Index) + choices[rnd.Next(choices.Length)] + str.Substring(m.Index + m.Length);Di2015NewLine                m = Regex.Match(str, pattern);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the modified string.Di2015NewLine            return str;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine            Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine            string str = "{Hello|Hi} {World|People}! {C{#|++|}|Java} is an {awesome|amazing} language.";Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(spintax(rnd, str));Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8005851Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool ValidateMail(string mailAdress)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(mailAdress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ShowError("please enter email id!!");Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //The regular expression matches at:Di2015NewLine    //[anything]-@-[anything except "."]-.-[2 or 3 chars after the "."]Di2015NewLine    else if (!Regex.Match(mailAdress, @".+\\@[^\\.]+\\..{2,3}")Di2015NewLine                            .Length == mailAdress.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ShowError("please enter correct email id!");Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return trueDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8010954Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Queue<ItemToPrint> PrintQueue = new Queue<ItemToPrint>();Di2015NewLine    private BackgroundWorker bgwPrintWatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetupBackgroundWorker()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler(bgwPrintWatcher_ProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(bgwPrintWatcher_RunWorkerCompleted);Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler(bgwPrintWatcher_DoWork);Di2015NewLine        bgwPrintWatcher.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void bgwPrintWatcher_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker worker = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLine        while (!worker.CancellationPending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Prevent writing to queue while we are reading / editing itDi2015NewLine            lock (PrintQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (PrintQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ItemToPrint item = PrintQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    // Two options here, you can either sent it back to the main thread to printDi2015NewLine                    worker.ReportProgress(PrintQueue.Count + 1, item);Di2015NewLine                    // or print from the background threadDi2015NewLine                    Print(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Print(ItemToPrint item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Print it hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddItemToPrint(ItemToPrint item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (PrintQueue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PrintQueue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void bgwPrintWatcher_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Anything here will run from the main / original threadDi2015NewLine        // PrintQueue will no longer be watchedDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void bgwPrintWatcher_ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Anything here will run from the main / original threadDi2015NewLine        ItemToPrint item = e.UserState as ItemToPrint;Di2015NewLine        // e.ProgressPercentage holds the int value passed as the first paramDi2015NewLine        Print(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8011624Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine   if (IsPostBack) {Di2015NewLine      // re-populate javascript-fill UIDi2015NewLine   } else {Di2015NewLine   } Di2015NewLine   Initialize();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8011654Di2015UniqueSeparator/* M[] is an array of message digestsDi2015NewLine * MD() is the message digest function */Di2015NewLineM[0]=MD(data . salt);Di2015NewLinefor (i=1; i<count; i++) M[0]=MD(M[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinei=1Di2015NewLinewhile (data still needed for key and iv)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    M[i]=MD(M[i-1] . data . salt);Di2015NewLine    for (i=1; i<count; i++) M[i]=MD(M[i]);Di2015NewLine    i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIf the salt is NULL, it is not used.Di2015NewLineThe digests are concatenated together.Di2015NewLineM = M[0] . M[1] . M[2] .......Di2015NewLine
8011654Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void DeriveKeyAndIV(byte[] data, byte[] salt, int count, out byte[] key, out byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<byte> hashList = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    byte[] currentHash = new byte[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int preHashLength = data.Length + ((salt != null) ? salt.Length : 0);Di2015NewLine    byte[] preHash = new byte[preHashLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Buffer.BlockCopy(data, 0, preHash, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine    if (salt != null)Di2015NewLine        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(salt, 0, preHash, data.Length, salt.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MD5 hash = MD5.Create();Di2015NewLine    currentHash = hash.ComputeHash(preHash);          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentHash = hash.ComputeHash(currentHash);            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    hashList.AddRange(currentHash);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (hashList.Count < 48) // for 32-byte key and 16-byte ivDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        preHashLength = currentHash.Length + data.Length + ((salt != null) ? salt.Length : 0);Di2015NewLine        preHash = new byte[preHashLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(currentHash, 0, preHash, 0, currentHash.Length);Di2015NewLine        System.Buffer.BlockCopy(data, 0, preHash, currentHash.Length, data.Length);Di2015NewLine        if (salt != null)Di2015NewLine            System.Buffer.BlockCopy(salt, 0, preHash, currentHash.Length + data.Length, salt.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentHash = hash.ComputeHash(preHash);            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentHash = hash.ComputeHash(currentHash);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hashList.AddRange(currentHash);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    hash.Clear();Di2015NewLine    key = new byte[32];Di2015NewLine    iv = new byte[16];Di2015NewLine    hashList.CopyTo(0, key, 0, 32);Di2015NewLine    hashList.CopyTo(32, iv, 0, 16);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8012213Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace BlackFoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLine    using touch event for legacy support will be disabled.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class DisableTouchConversionToMouse : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static readonly LowLevelMouseProc hookCallback = HookCallback;Di2015NewLine        static IntPtr hookId = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DisableTouchConversionToMouse()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hookId = SetHook(hookCallback);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IntPtr SetHook(LowLevelMouseProc proc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 0);Di2015NewLine            if (setHookResult == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Win32Exception();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return setHookResult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        delegate IntPtr LowLevelMouseProc(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IntPtr HookCallback(int nCode, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (nCode >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var info = (MSLLHOOKSTRUCT)Marshal.PtrToStructure(lParam, typeof(MSLLHOOKSTRUCT));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var extraInfo = (uint)info.dwExtraInfo.ToInt32();Di2015NewLine                if ((extraInfo & MOUSEEVENTF_MASK) == MOUSEEVENTF_FROMTOUCH)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if((extraInfo & 0x80) != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Touch InputDi2015NewLine                        return new IntPtr(1);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Pen InputDi2015NewLine                        return new IntPtr(1);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return UnsafeNativeMethods.CallNextHookEx(hookId, nCode, wParam, lParam);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool disposed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (disposed) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine        struct POINTDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public int x;Di2015NewLine            public int 8014054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ConfigurationTaskRunnerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Execute( params string[] assemblyNames )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assemblies = assemblyNames.Select( Assembly.Load ).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine        Execute( assemblies );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Execute( IEnumerable<Assembly> assemblies )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tasks = new List<IConfigurationTask>();Di2015NewLine        assemblies.ForEach( a => tasks.AddRange( a.CreateInstances<IConfigurationTask>() ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tasks.ForEach( t => t.Configure() );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
8014054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<T> CreateInstances<T>( this Assembly assembly )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var query = from type in assembly.GetTypes().Where( t => typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom( t ) && typeof(T) != t ) Di2015NewLine                 where type.IsClass && ! type.IsAbstract && type.GetConstructor( Type.EmptyTypes ) != null Di2015NewLine                 select (T) Activator.CreateInstance( type );Di2015NewLine     return query.ToList();Di2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine

8014994Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass StudentComparer : IComparer<Student>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string memberName = string.Empty; // specifies the member name to be sortedDi2015NewLine    SortOrder sortOrder = SortOrder.None; // Specifies the SortOrder.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// constructor to set the sort column and sort order.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="strMemberName"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sortingOrder"></param>Di2015NewLine    public StudentComparer(string strMemberName, SortOrder sortingOrder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        memberName = strMemberName;Di2015NewLine        sortOrder = sortingOrder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Compares two Students based on member name and sort orderDi2015NewLine    /// and return the result.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="Student1"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="Student2"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(Student Student1, Student Student2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int returnValue = 1;Di2015NewLine        switch (memberName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Name" :Di2015NewLine                if (sortOrder == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student1.Name.CompareTo(Student2.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student2.Name.CompareTo(Student1.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "Sex":Di2015NewLine                if (sortOrder == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student1.Sex.CompareTo(Student2.Sex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student2.Sex.CompareTo(Student1.Sex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                if (sortOrder == SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student1.Name.CompareTo(Student2.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = Student2.Name.CompareTo(Student1.StudentId);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return returnValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8016839Di2015UniqueSeparator[OnSerialized]
8016839Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StackOverflow_8010677Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DataContract(Name = "Person", Namespace = "")]Di2015NewLine    public class PersonDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DataMember]Di2015NewLine        public string Name;Di2015NewLine        [DataMember(EmitDefaultValue = false)]Di2015NewLine        public int Age;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int ageSaved;Di2015NewLine        [OnSerializing]Di2015NewLine        void OnSerializing(StreamingContext context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ageSaved = this.Age;Di2015NewLine            this.Age = default(int); // will not be serializedDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        [OnSerialized]Di2015NewLine        void OnSerialized(StreamingContext context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Age = this.ageSaved;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("Person[Name={0},Age={1}]", this.Name, this.Age);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Person p1 = new Person { Name = "Jane Roe", Age = 23 };Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dcs = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(Person));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serializing: {0}", p1);Di2015NewLine        dcs.WriteObject(ms, p1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("   ==> {0}", Encoding.UTF8.GetString(ms.ToArray()));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("   ==> After serialization: {0}", p1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Deserializing a XML which contains the Age member");Di2015NewLine        const string XML = "<Person><Age>33</Age><Name>John Doe</Name></Person>";Di2015NewLine        Person p2 = (Person)dcs.ReadObject(new MemoryStream(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(XML)));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("  ==> {0}", p2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8019847Di2015UniqueSeparatorlong read = 0;Di2015NewLineint r = -1; Di2015NewLineconst long bytesToRead = 10 * 1024 * 1024;Di2015NewLineconst int bufferSize = 10*1024;Di2015NewLinebyte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLineMD5 md5 = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineusing(var stream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read) )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while(read <= bytesToRead && r != 0) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        read += (r = stream.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize));Di2015NewLine        md5.TransformBlock(buffer, 0, r, null, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinemd5.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0,0);Di2015NewLinestring md5Final = String.Join("", md5.Hash.Select(x => x.ToString("x2")));Di2015NewLine

8024154Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Partition(IList<int> list, int l, int r){Di2015NewLine    int pivot = list[l];Di2015NewLine    int i = l+1;Di2015NewLine    int j = r;Di2015NewLine    while(true){Di2015NewLine        //{i,j| l< i,j <= r}Di2015NewLine        while(i<=r && list[i] <  pivot)++i;Di2015NewLine        while(j>l  && list[j] >= pivot)--j;Di2015NewLine        if(i<j)Di2015NewLine            Swap(list, i, j);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Swap(list, l, j);Di2015NewLine    return j;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8024996Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Your template is simplerDi2015NewLine    string template = "Hi {Name.First}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // some JSONDi2015NewLine    string data = @"{""Name"":{""First"":""Jack"",""Last"":""Smith""}}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    JavaScriptSerializer jss = new JavaScriptSerializer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now `d` contains all the values you need, in a dictionaryDi2015NewLine    dynamic d = jss.Deserialize(data, typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // running your template against a regex toDi2015NewLine    // extract the tokens that need to be replacedDi2015NewLine    var result = Regex.Replace(template, @"{?{([^}]+)}?}", (m) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Skip escape values (ex: {{escaped value}} )Di2015NewLine            if (m.Value.StartsWith("{{"))Di2015NewLine                return m.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // split the token by `.` to run against the dictionaryDi2015NewLine            var pieces = m.Groups[1].Value.Split('.');Di2015NewLine            dynamic value = d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // go after all the pieces, recursively going insideDi2015NewLine            // ex: "Name.First"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 1 (value = value["Name"])Di2015NewLine            //    value = new Dictionary<string, object>Di2015NewLine            //    {Di2015NewLine            //        { "First": "Jack" }, { "Last": "Smith" }Di2015NewLine            //    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Step 2 (value = value["First"])Di2015NewLine            //    value = "Jack"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var piece in pieces)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = value[piece]; // go inside each timeDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8025905Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MemoryUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a deep copy of a given object instanceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TObject">Type of a given object</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="instance">Object to be cloned</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="throwInCaseOfError">Di2015NewLine    /// A value which indicating whether exception should be thrown in case ofDi2015NewLine    /// error whils clonin</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns a deep copy of a given object</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Uses BInarySerialization to create a true deep copy</remarks>Di2015NewLine    public static TObject DeepCopy<TObject>(this TObject instance, bool throwInCaseOfError)Di2015NewLine        where TObject : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (instance == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("instance");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TObject clonedInstance = default(TObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BinaryFormatter binaryFormatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine                binaryFormatter.Serialize(stream, instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // reset position to the beginning of the stream soDi2015NewLine                // deserialize would be able to deserialize an object instanceDi2015NewLine                stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                clonedInstance = (TObject)binaryFormatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string errorMessage = String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentCulture,Di2015NewLine                            "Exception Type: {0}, Message: {1}{2}",Di2015NewLine                            exception.GetType(),Di2015NewLine                            exception.Message,Di2015NewLine                            exception.InnerException == null ? String.Empty :Di2015NewLine                            String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentCulture,Di2015NewLine                                        " InnerException Type: {0}, Message: {1}",Di2015NewLine                                        exception.InnerException.GetType(),Di2015NewLine                                        exception.InnerException.Message));Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(errorMessage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (throwInCaseOfError)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return clonedInstance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

8025963Di2015UniqueSeparator        // reference to window in another threadDi2015NewLine        Window outputWindow = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread thread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // another threadDi2015NewLine            outputWindow = new Window();Di2015NewLine            outputWindow.Show();Di2015NewLine            // run event loopDi2015NewLine            System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run();Di2015NewLine        }) { ApartmentState = ApartmentState.STA, IsBackground = true };Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (outputWindow == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // wait until the window in another thread has been createdDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // simulate processDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            outputWindow.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() => { outputWindow.Title = i.ToString(); }), System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500); // simulate some hard work so we can see the change on another window's titleDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // close the window or shutdown dispatcher or abort the thread...Di2015NewLine        thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine
8025963Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void DoSomeHardWork(Action<Window, object> toDo, object actionParams)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread windowThread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Window waitWindow = new Window();Di2015NewLine            waitWindow.Loaded += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread workThread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Run work method in work thread passing theDi2015NewLine                    // wait window as parameterDi2015NewLine                    toDo(waitWindow, actionParams);Di2015NewLine                }) { IsBackground = true };Di2015NewLine                // Start the work thread.Di2015NewLine                workThread.Start();Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            waitWindow.Show();Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.Run();Di2015NewLine        }) { ApartmentState = ApartmentState.STA, IsBackground = true };Di2015NewLine        // Start the wait window thread.Di2015NewLine        // When window loads, it will create work thread and start it.Di2015NewLine        windowThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void MyWork(Window waitWindow, object parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Report progress to user through wait window.Di2015NewLine            waitWindow.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke((Action)(() => waitWindow.Title = string.Format("{0}: {1}", parameters, i)), DispatcherPriority.Normal);Di2015NewLine            // Simulate long work.Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // The work is done. Shutdown the wait window dispather.Di2015NewLine        // This will stop listening for events and will eventualy terminateDi2015NewLine        // the wait window thread.Di2015NewLine        waitWindow.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void button1_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DoSomeHardWork(MyWork, DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

8026650Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LOH_RegExDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static List<string> storage = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        private const int ChunkSize = 100000;Di2015NewLine        private static StringBuilder _sb = new StringBuilder(ChunkSize * 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pinnedText = new string(' ', ChunkSize * 10);Di2015NewLine            var sourceCodePin = GCHandle.Alloc(pinnedText, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var rgx = new Regex("A", RegexOptions.CultureInvariant | RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var i = 0; i < 30000; i++)Di2015NewLine                {                   Di2015NewLine                    //Simulate that we read data from stream to SBDi2015NewLine                    UpdateSB(i);Di2015NewLine                    CopyInto(pinnedText);                   Di2015NewLine                    var rgxMatch = rgx.Match(pinnedText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!rgxMatch.Success)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("RegEx failed!");Di2015NewLine                        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Extra buffer to fragment LoHDi2015NewLine                    storage.Add(new string('z', 50000));Di2015NewLine                    if ((i%100) == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(i + ",");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("OOM Crash!");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static unsafe void CopyInto(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fixed (char* pChar = text)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int i;Di2015NewLine                for (i = 0; i < _sb.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pChar[i] = _sb[i];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                pChar[i + 1] = '\\0';Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void UpdateSB(int extraSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _sb.Remove(0,_sb.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class JsonCreationConverter<T> : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Create an instance of
